name: Calamity Overhaul mod
description:
Revitalize your Calamity Mod experience with Calamity Overhaul, a carefully crafted mod that optimizes every aspect of the Calamity universe. Immerse yourself in a world where hundreds of weapons have been reimagined, balancing has been improved, and game progression is enriched with innovative crafting systems.

Weapon Rework:

Hundreds of Calamity Mod weapons have been redesigned, offering players a more polished, practical and visually impressive arsenal.
Each weapon has undergone extensive tweaks to improve gameplay mechanics and overall performance.
The combat experience will be incredible with upgraded weapons that offer both form and function.
Balancing and Optimization:

Extensive numerical balancing ensures a smoother and more satisfying gaming experience.
Every aspect of Calamity Mod has been reviewed and fine-tuned for optimal balance.
Enjoy a more connected and immersive gaming experience with tweaks made to enemies, items, and progression.
Advanced Weapons:

Discover a variety of new weapons introduced to expand your arsenal and strategic options.
Experiment with unique weapon designs and playstyles to conquer the challenges of the Calamity universe.
Unleash devastating attacks with powerful new weapons designed to diversify your combat repertoire.
Crafting System Rework:

Embark on a journey of enriched game progression with an all-new crafting system.
Explore improved crafting recipes that offer more customization and player creativity.
Master the art of crafting to forge legendary weapons and equipment worthy of a true champion.
Constant Updates:

Stay tuned for future updates as the Calamity Overhaul mod continues to redefine the Calamity experience.
Get ready for fresh content and reimagined mechanics with every new update, providing endless excitement and challenge.
Join the community on Github to contribute to the development of the mod and follow its development first-hand.
Experience the Calamity universe like never before with the Calamity Overhaul mod. Redefine combat, crafting, and progression as you embark on an epic adventure full of new challenges and discoveries.

name: Anarchist
description:
"Anarchist Mod" for tModLoader is a thoughtfully designed mod that is currently in beta testing. This means that not all features have been added yet. Currently, content is limited to pre-Hardmode only.

1. New Story and Weapons:
The story of the mod leads the player(s) to defend their world from the forces of chaos along with the remnants of the Cthulhu invasion.
Added new items, armor, accessories and weapons throughout the game.
2. More than 500 Items:
The beta version of the mod adds over 500 items, giving players ample opportunities to improve their character and equipment.
3. New Class - Acolyte:
The mod introduces a new class - Acolyte. The Acolyte uses occult damage and wields the dark magic of the world to repel even greater evils.
4. Four New Bosses:
The beta adds four new bosses, providing players with additional challenges and rewards.
5. Two New Modes:
Two new difficulty modes have been introduced - Anarchy Mode and Pandemonium Mode, immersing players in even more challenging challenges.
6. Changes in Quality of Life:
The mod introduces various improvements to the gameplay to make the gameplay more convenient and fun.
7. Configuration according to your taste:
It is very important to note that the mod contains many customizable changes, many of which may be controversial.
For example, by default both Corruption and the Crimson Forest are created in your world.
There is also a strict boss progression that limits the order in which determinate bosses can be fought.
The recommended settings are still the default ones, but it is understood that many players may not like some of these changes, so they are made customizable.
8. Custom Music:
To listen to the mod's special music, make sure the "Anarchist Mod - Music" mod is enabled.
"Anarchist Mod" offers an immersive experience with innovative changes and new content designed to keep players interested throughout the journey.

name: Echoes of the Ancients
description:
Echoes of the Ancients is a unique mod for tModLoader that adds a lot of new content, with an emphasis on cool and unique items.

The main content of the mod includes:

320+ new items: Expand your arsenal with powerful new weapons, exciting tools and unique equipment.
2 new bosses: Take on the challenge and fight powerful new enemies to earn valuable rewards.
Content after the Lord's Moon: Explore new areas and test your skills against new dangers and challenges.
5 new ores with corresponding kits: Mine and process new resources to create powerful items and equipment.
Even more not listed here!: The mod comes with even more content that will add variety and interest to your game.
Don't miss the opportunity to immerse yourself in new adventures and discover amazing things in the world Echoes of the Ancients!

name: Fargo's Enemy Modifiers
description:
Fargo's Enemy Modifiers is a mod for tModLoader that adds various modifiers to enemies. There are currently 48 of them.

General modifiers

Blue, Green, Orange, Purple, Red, Yellow - colors the enemy in the corresponding color
Armored - increases defense by 50%
Healthy - increases health by 50%
Impenetrable - penetrating projectiles are destroyed on impact
Light - Receives increased knockback from hits
Menacing - increases damage by 50%
Rampaging - Inflicts extremely strong knockback on you
Regenerating - restores 10% health every 5 seconds
Slow - speed reduced by 50%
Sluggish - performs all actions half as slow
Splitting - upon death, spawns 2-3 smaller versions of itself with reduced characteristics
Swift - speed increased by 50%
Unrelenting - knockback immunity
Wealthy - drops 5 times more coins
Unusual modifiers

Accelerating - gradually increases speed up to 4 times normal. When you are hit or when you hit them, the speed is reset
Bloodthirsty - takes 25% damage every time you are hit
Bulletproof - Gain 80% resistance to ranged damage
Flaming - appears with a permanent "On Fire" debuff, leaves a trail of harmful flames, speed increased by 50%
Fortifying - defense reduced by 50%. Creates an aura that gives other enemies 50% damage resistance
Hexproof - not subject to damage over time
Huge - size increased by 50%, health increased by 25%, speed reduced by 15%
Infested - periodically spawns small spiders
Metallic - has increased defense, receives less knockback and ore drops
Miniature - size reduced by 50%, health reduced by 25%, speed increased by 20%
Possessed - Replaces your normal AI with a ghost AI
Rallying - creates an aura that buffs other enemies: +25% damage and +25% speed
Shielded - gains 80% melee damage resistance
Stealthy - slowly becomes almost invisible, becomes fully visible when hit
Vaccinated - immunity to all debuffs
Vampiric - Restores some health when dealing damage
Veiled - gains 80% resistance to magic and summoning damage
Rare modifiers

Chained - Appears chained to you and cannot leave a radius around you
Devouring - Devours any enemy with less or equal health. At the same time, the enemy restores health, increases maximum health and damage
Hyper - performs all actions twice as fast
Imaginary - transparent. Ceases to exist upon any contact
Juggernaut - health increased by 150%, damage, defense and size increased by 25%, but the Sluggish modifier is built in (performs actions half as slow)
Merchant - Replaces its regular AI with a city dweller AI. He will give you one random free item from the current Traveling Trader's store and then disappear
Rainbow - painted in rainbow colors and drops 5 times more items, not including coins
Showman - explodes into smoke and birds upon death
Solidified - Can no longer walk through blocks (only affects enemies that can normally walk through blocks)
Undying - hangs at 5 health for 5 seconds before dying
Worm - Appears with several body segments trailing behind it. Gain immunity to knockback and 2x health
Mythic modifiers (appears only in difficult game mode)

Royal - health increased by 200%, size increased by 200%, movement speed 60%, immunity to knockback, periodically creates mini-versions of itself when damaged
NEW UPDATE - Version 0.6.1

Fixed extremely long names of city residents
Added Red, Blue, Yellow, Green, Orange and Purple modifiers. They simply color the enemy.
Colored modifiers now combine with each other rather than replacing each other
Changed the Possessed modifier so that it does not cancel its normal AI, but adds ghost AI additionally
Worm body segments and Splitting spawns now inherit all other modifiers from the parent enemy
Added Eater of Worlds segments to default blacklist
Fixed announcements leaving even after enemy death or disappearance
Fixed ad colors not always matching the color of the rarest modifier
Fixed the declaration of the Stealthy modifier when it is combined with other modifiers
Fixed lack of transparency for Stealthy and Possessed modifiers when combined with other modifiers
Fixed enemies receiving modifiers that don't take damage
NEW UPDATE - Version 0.6

Enemies can now have multiple modifiers at once (default setting to 3).
This can be turned on/off, and each additional modifier has its own percentage of chance
Over 1 billion modifier combinations are now possible. Let me know if anything needs fixing
Added setting for permanent display of ads
Added additional loot/coins for some more advanced modifiers
Rainbow now also multiplies coins
Fixed missing Possessed modifier name declaration

name: Block's Leveling
description:
The Block Development Mechanics mod introduces the mechanics of leveling up weapons in Terraria, allowing you to use them longer, constantly developing their capabilities. The level mechanics are borrowed from Example Mod, but they have received a significant number of improvements, making the system more balanced and detailed.

Features of pumping:

The mod emulates leveling mechanisms typical for RPGs, where the higher the level, the more difficult it is to achieve, but the more significant the bonuses become.
Weapons are not initially upgraded - this function must be activated, more about this in the “Runes” section.
Upgraded weapons gain experience (XP) with each hit dealt, usually equivalent to the damage dealt.
Bosses, special events and worms have coefficients that reduce experience gained to avoid rapid leveling.
The experience required to level up increases dynamically with each new weapon level.
The weapon increases its damage output with each new level. The growth is small, but in total it gives significant bonuses.
The maximum level is 100; upon reaching it, the weapon receives triple damage.
Runes:

Craft items that activate a weapon's ability to gain XP and level up.
It is necessary to keep the weapon in the active inventory slot and right-click to use the rune from the inventory.
Different runes set different "Base XP", which determines the difficulty of leveling up the weapon.
"Base XP" indicates the amount of experience required to reach the first level and serves as the basis for all subsequent thresholds.
The rarity of a weapon determines which runes can be applied to it.
The higher the level of a rune, the later materials are required to create it and the more “Base XP” it brings.
All runes begin their journey with the “Slumbering Rune of Experience,” which can be crafted from 5 stones and a gem at a workbench.
“Ethereal Runes” are special runes that apply to all types of weapons, allowing you to bypass restrictions and balance settings.
Experience Orbs:

Rare items that drop from enemies and instantly grant experience to weapons.
You need to hold a weapon and right-click to use the orb from your inventory.
The experience gained depends on the size/type of the orb and the "Base XP" of the weapon.
There are 5 rarities of orb, the rarer ones are more powerful.
There is also a sixth, special type that gives one weapon level.
Orbs drop in an inactive form and require cleaning at the appropriate station.
All orbs can be recycled into XP-reducing counterparts.
Leveling up the player:

An experimental feature that allows players to increase their level.
The player's experience gain depends only on the configuration settings.
The player's experience is equal to the damage dealt, without exception, which corresponds to the total damage dealt for the entire game.
The experience requirements for players are much stricter than for weapons; To reach level 100 you need 10 billion XP!
Player level can also increase damage, but much less and this feature is disabled by default.
Other features:

Sound and text notifications about level up. Both types of notifications can be turned off.
Tooltips with information about XP, weapon level and power.
Interaction with other mods and compatibility with another mod by the author - 'Weapon Augments'.
Setting:

A wide range of settings with detailed descriptions for fine-tuning the balance.
Enabling and adjusting the strength of damage bonuses from levels.
Adjust the speed of gaining XP and increasing weapon levels.
Adjustment of maximum level, experience and damage boosts.
Customization of tooltips added by the mod.
Enable/disable the drop of Experience Orbs.
Enable/disable player leveling and accompanying damage increases.
And much more!

name: Enchanted Moons
description:
The Enchanted Moons mod introduces four new peace events to Terraria that bring unique blessings to the powers of the night. Each event has a 1/9 chance of happening each night and can be summoned using special summon items.

Events and their features:

Blue Moon:
Bonus: Blessing of the Moon's Power - increases the player's luck by +25% in pre-hard mode and +50% in hard mode. The moon shares its luck with you.
Call: Blue Medallion
5 Sapphire
10 Any platinum bars
(on the workbench)
Drop: Sapphire Ring - 1% chance to drop from any enemy during the event
Cherry Moon:
Bonus: Blessing of Flower Power - Increases the player's health regeneration. Wrap yourself in the healing aura of the Cherry Moon. Your wounds heal faster.
Call: Cherry Amulet
5 Rubies
10 Any platinum bars
(on the workbench)
Drop: Amethyst Ring - 1% chance to drop from any enemy during the event
Harvest Moon:
Bonus: Blessing of Bountiful Harvest - Enemies drop 1.5x more gold in pre-hard mode and 2x more gold in hard mode. The blessing of the Harvest Moon fills your pockets with wealth.
Call: Harvest Lantern
5 Topaz
10 Any platinum bars
(on the workbench)
Drop: Topaz Ring - 1% chance to drop from any enemy during the event
Mint Moon:
Bonus: Blessing of Mint Fresh - Increases the player's damage and movement speed. The sparkling light of the Peppermint Moon enhances your magical abilities.
Call: Mint Ring
5 Emeralds
10 Any platinum bars
(on the workbench)
Drop: Emerald Ring - 1% chance to drop from any enemy during the event
Additional features:

Each moon comes with its own unique soundtrack and shaders.
In the mod's configurations, you can disable the natural appearance of any of the moons and change the speed at which enemies appear during these events.
These nightly events add a new level of visuals and atmosphere to the game, and also offer players interesting gameplay variations with new power-up options and valuable items.

name: Apacchii's Classes: Reborn
description:
"Apacchii's Classes: Reborn" is a mod for tModLoader that adds new character classes to the Terraria game. It is designed and created by Apacchi, a talented modder in the Terraria community. The mod expands the gameplay and offers players new options and choices when creating and developing a character.

Mod features:

New Character Classes: The mod adds several new classes that players can choose for their character. Please note that these classes can only be accessed after meeting certain in-game conditions.
Warrior: This class focuses on melee combat and strength. Warriors have unique abilities and skills that allow them to effectively deal with enemies at short range.
Mage: Magic classes are masters of magic and use spells to attack enemies. They can create powerful projectors, summon elements, and use a wide range of spells to defeat their opponents.
Marksman: Marksmen play a ranged role and use a variety of ranged weapons. They have precision and accuracy, and also have special skills that make them powerful at a distance.
Summoner: Summoners specialize in summoning and controlling minions and creatures. They can call upon various allies to fight on their side and enhance their abilities.
Unique Skills and Gear: Each class has their own skill line and special items that enhance their abilities. With these skills and items, players can customize their character according to their preferences in the game.
Balance and Progression: The mod is carefully balanced to provide players with an interesting and fair gameplay. The progression of the new classes follows the standard Terraria game progression to integrate into the existing world and structure of the game.
Compatibility with other mods: Apacchii's Classes: Reborn is compatible with other tModLoader mods, allowing you to create a unique and varied gaming experience when combined with other mods.

name: More Terra Weapons
description:
Upgrade your Arsenal in Terraria with the More Terra Weapons mod! Discover new, powerful weapons and accessories for every stage of the game - from the initial struggle for survival to the final battles with the conquerors of dimensions.

All the way from Premium to Post-Cultist:

Pre-Hardmode Weapons (4 pieces): Prepare for the brutal realities of Terraria with new tools to destroy your enemies.
Pre-Hardmode Accessories (2 pieces): Customize your character for the challenges ahead with unique accessories.
Hardmode Weapons (6 pieces): Increase your fighting potential with weapons worthy of heroes.
Hardmode Accessories (2 pieces): Additional ways to strengthen your skills in battle.
Hardmode Wings (1 pair): Open up the skies with a new set of wings, each with unique animations and characteristics.
Post-Cultist Weapons (6 pieces): Bring destruction to the cultists who stand in your way using the latest in weaponry warfare.
Post-Cultist Accessory (1 piece): Complete your arsenal with an item that will get the most out of your weapon.
Additional fixes and improvements:

Patch for Whips: No more underestimating whips! The mod fixes an issue where increasing the size of whips through prefixes did not increase their range.
Enjoy new weapons and accessories that suit your playstyle, and let every enemy in Terraria tremble at the mere sight of your newfound arsenal!

name: Nurse Shop
description:
Introducing the Nurse's Shop, a mod that adds a shop to your nurse in Terraria. As the game progresses and you defeat bosses, you will gain access to new goods. The mod also includes compatibility with Calamity Mod.

Vanilla game progression (no mods):

Default: Mushrooms, Bottled Water, Bottled Honey, Potion of Minor Healing
After defeating the Royal Slime: Healing Potion, Long Lasting Heart Potion
After defeating the Eye of Cthulhu: Recovery Potion, Life Crystal
After logging into Hardmode: Potion of Vitality, Potion of Greater Healing
After defeating all three Mechanical Bosses: Fruit of Life
After defeating all the Heavenly Pillars: Super Healing Potion
Progression in Calamity Mod:

After defeating the Moon Lord: Supreme Healing Potion
After defeating the Eater of Gods: Omega Healing Potion
It is recommended to use this mod together with the "Dialogue Panel Rework" mod, as there may be some problems with the interface.

name: Radiance
description:
Radiance is an expansion mod that buffs the Daylight Empress of Light as a stronger boss after Moonlord rather than before or after Golem.

The stats in the fight against the Empress of Light during the day have been adjusted, her attacks have flashy effects and modified behavior, making them more effective against end-phase movement options. In addition, powerful rewards are given out that enhance her primate items.

Cautions:

Flashing lights are present. Some effects can be disabled, but not all.
Not recommended for use with other difficulty mods. Daytime may be incorrect or unavailable, so it is necessary to disable them before the battle.
The balance in classic mode may be disrupted. You are expected to have and use movement items in Expert Mode. This may change in the future.
Changes

The Empress of Light's attacks become much more difficult during the day and even more difficult in Master mode.
Empress of Light's attacks no longer deal absurd damage and can be dodged. Instead, multiple hits in succession are always fatal, regardless of health or defense, and dodging only partially reduces damage taken.
The Empress of Light is impervious to teleportation items during the day. The Rod of Harmony works like the Rod of Discord, and if the “Chaos State” debuff is present, all lost lives from the Empress are restored, which increases the duration of the battle.
Terraprism is available at night as a reward for missing hits. This can be disabled in the configuration. It is also available during the day as a secondary trophy.
objects

Crystal Bell: Given to the player after summoning the Empress of Light several times during the day. Can be used to endlessly summon her only during the daytime.
Radiant Charm: Dropped by the Empress of Light during the day. Significantly increases the strength of her primate weapons and wings.
Shine Dye: Cosmetic item. Obtained as a reward for not hitting during the day. Good luck!
Help

If you are having difficulty (which is likely), make sure you have:
Celestial Starboard + Floating Insignia - These are practically mandatory.
Slime for faster fall. Although it is optional, it is very useful.

name: Another RPG Mod
description:
"Another RPG Mod" is a mod for the game Terraria, designed for use with the tModLoader modification. This mod adds more RPG elements to the game, which enriches the gameplay and enhances the player's experience.

Adds new character classes, allowing the player to choose the role of a fighter, mage or marksman with unique sets of weapons and abilities.
Introduces new types of enemies such as goblins, dragons, vampires and others that pose danger and provide players with new challenges.
Introduces new bosses that challenge players to fight more powerful creatures and earn unique rewards.
Includes new locations and dungeons that expand the world of Terraria and add variety to the gaming environment.
Improves the crafting system by adding new items, blocks, weapons and armor.
Provides additional quests, tasks and achievements that help the player progress and receive bonus rewards.
Allows you to use various portals, magical items and abilities to move around the world or communicate with other players.

name: Living World Mod
description:
"Living World Mod [INDEV]" is a modification for the game Terraria, created for use in conjunction with the tModLoader program. The main goal of this mod is to add more life and activity to your Terraria world, recreating the feeling of a living world.

New NPCs:
Various new animals such as wolves, cats, birds and others that randomly appear in your world. You will be able to interact with them and possibly receive rewards.
Rare animals, including legendary and exotic creatures, that you can find and tame.
New events:
Animal Migrations: Mass animal migrations occur periodically, filling the world with new creatures. You will be able to observe these phenomena and take part if you wish.
Hunting and Gathering: Various quests and events involving hunting animals and collecting rare items for those looking for adventure.
New items and recipes:
Clothing and accessories related to animals and wildlife.
Foods and potions that can be made from ingredients found in nature.
Various items that can be obtained by interacting with animals or as a result of completing tasks.
Improved Environment:
Improved world generation, including new biomes and regions, as well as an improved atmosphere.
Natural phenomena such as time of day, weather, and the cycles of nature.
Additional functions:
Interactive mechanics that allow you to interact with the living world of Terraria.
Additional settings and mod options that allow you to customize the functionality to suit your play style.
It is worth noting that “Living World Mod [INDEV]” is under development and may contain flaws or may not be fully completed. However, this is an interesting project for players who want to add more life and variety to the world of Terraria.

name: MooMoo's Ultimate Yoyo Revamp
description:
As the most complete overhaul of the yo-yo subclass yet, MooMoo's Ultimate Yoyo Revamp brings a fresh wind to the gameplay, enriching it with interesting mechanics. This mod rethinks the yo-yo bag system, gives new effects to the previously bland and boring vanilla yo-yo, and offers many other new features.

The most important innovations in this mod include:

Improved Yo-Yo Bag System
Now the yo-yo bag is not limited to just a combination of glove, thread and counterweight. It provides additional customization slots, expanding your options without changing the core concept of the yo-yo bag.
Meet the new NPC - Skeleton Shopkeeper
Now the NPC Skeleton Shopkeeper has become the only seller of all yo-yo-related items. Code 1, counterweights and other accessories will not be available from other merchants. His store is extremely simple: as you progress through various bosses (with some exceptions), he will expand the selection. He has two different stores - one for yo-yos and another for accessories. It will appear in the world as soon as you get any yo-yo, but please note that some yo-yos from other mods may not work, so it is better to start with a wooden yo-yo and keep it in your inventory.
Unique effects for each yo-yo
Now each yo-yo has a unique effect, which can be passive or activated when a certain condition is met (for example, by wearing a certain accessory).
Wide selection of new yo-yos!
The mod offers a huge assortment of new yo-yos, so you always have a choice that suits your playstyle. From boss-themed yo-yos to true yo-yos, they'll let you show off your skills and tackle obstacles in style.
It's important to note that this mod does not strive to be completely balanced. Some items may be too powerful or, conversely, too weak. This doesn't mean the game will become too easy - just that some items will require further customization. The mod is in a very early stage of development, so there are plans to add new items and fix bugs in the future.

name: Fargo's Soul Mod Extras
description:
Fargo's Soul Mod Extras for the tModLoader platform is part of a larger mod package from developer Fargo, including mods such as Fargo's Mutant Mod and Fargo's Souls Mod. These mods bring many changes and additions to the Terraria game, bringing new challenges and levels for advanced players.

The Fargo's Soul Mod Add-ons, now known as Fargo's Soul Mod Extras, offer exciting and fun new features that blend seamlessly with the original Fargo's Soul Mod. This expansion only works with the main Fargo's Soul Mod, creating an enhanced and varied gaming experience for players. The latest update to version 0.6.1 of the mod brings a number of changes and improvements, giving players even more options and fun. The new version also includes a renaming of the mod to Fargo's Soul Mod Extras, which helps clearly identify its presence and draw players' attention to its unique capabilities.

name: Zenith pickaxe
description:
The Zenith Pickaxe mod for tModLoader is an expansion for the game Terraria that adds a new weapon in the form of the Zenith Pickaxe. This modification allows players to use powerful weapons to quickly obtain resources and defeat enemies.

High Damage: The Zenith Pickaxe has high base damage, which makes it easy to deal with enemies in the game.
Multiple Functions: This weapon can function as both a weapon and a mining tool at the same time, making it very convenient and multi-functional.
Special Attacks: The Zenith Pickaxe has several unique abilities and special attacks that can be used to damage opponents.
Upgrades and Modifications: You can upgrade and modify the Zenith Pickaxe to make it even more powerful and effective. Various improvements can be added to the mod, such as increasing damage or adding special effects.
Aesthetics and Design: The Zenith pickaxe has a unique design and visual effects that make it unique and attractive.

name: One Piece
description:
One Piece Mod is an exciting mod for tModLoader that will immerse you in the fascinating world of One Piece. In this mod you will find a huge amount of new content to enhance your gaming experience.

The main features of the mod include:

20+ Devil Fruits: Discover over 20 different Devil Fruits, each of which will provide you with unique abilities and abilities.
15+ Swords: Fight your enemies with over 15 different swords, each with their own characteristics and powers.
1 ranged weapon: Use powerful ranged weapons to strike your enemies from afar.
3 fighting styles: Learn and apply 3 different fighting styles to become a true fighting master.
All 3 types of Haki and their variations: Use Haki to enhance your strength and become an even more dangerous opponent.
Variety of Khaki colors: Personalize your gaming aesthetic with different Khaki colors.
8 races: Choose from 8 different races, each with their own characteristics and unique abilities.
6 custom enemies: Face 6 new and unique enemies that will present you with new challenges and opportunities for victory.
1 custom boss: Face a powerful custom boss that will truly test your strength and skills.
10+ armor items: Upgrade your defenses with over 10 armor pieces that will provide you with extra bonuses and protection.

name: Dragon Ball Terraria: Calamity Addon
description:
Dragon Ball Terraria: Calamity Addon is an exciting addon for the Dragon Ball Terraria mod! It offers unique content designed specifically to interact with the Calamity playthrough. The addon adds many new and iconic items, and also introduces new forms, including the Ultra Instinct Sign, Ultra Instinct and even Ultra Ego!

One of the features of this addon is its multiplayer support, which allows players to enjoy an exciting gaming experience along with their friends. And that's not all! There will be a lot more exciting content to be added to the addon in the future.

Become a part of the unique and exciting world of Dragon Ball Terraria: Calamity Addon and immerse yourself in the epic adventures that await you!

name: Noitaria
description:
Noitaria is an exciting mod for tModLoader that adds new mechanics and content to the popular game Terraria. The mod is inspired by the famous game "Noita" and offers players a unique and exciting gaming adventure.

Magic spells: Noitaria adds new magic spells that allow players to use different elements and powers for battles. You can create fireballs, ice arrows, lightning and much more. Unlock new spells as you progress in the game and become a real magician.
Destructive effects: With new spells and items, Noitaria allows you to create devastating effects. You can destroy blocks, create explosions, and modify the environment to your advantage. Use your magical powers to explore and transform the world of Terraria.
New biomes and enemies: Noitaria adds new biomes and enemies that present new challenges for players. Explore new locations, including magical forests, underground caves and abandoned temples, and face dangerous new enemies.
Unique items and equipment: The Noitaria mod offers players new items and equipment that improve and expand their capabilities. Get new magical tools, armor and weapons to become stronger and more resistant to enemies.
Compatible with other mods: Noitaria is compatible with other popular Terraria mods, allowing you to enjoy new mechanics and content in combination with other mods you're already using.

name: Hunt of the Old God
description:
Hunt of the Old God is a mod for tModLoader that offers exciting adventures in the world of Terraria related to ancient deities. In this mod, you will explore unique locations, fight powerful enemies, and obtain powerful items while being hunted by deities.

The main features of the mod include:

New boss Goosma and mini-bosses: Challenge ancient deities who have unique abilities and complex combat mechanics. Defeat them to receive valuable rewards and succeed in your journey.
New locations: Explore ancient temples and dark dungeons filled with mysteries and dangers. Find valuable resources and items that will help you in your adventure.
New items and recipes: Craft powerful weapons, defenses, and accessories to enhance your strength and increase your effectiveness in battle. Exchange items with other players and create unique equipment combinations.
Puzzles and secrets: Solve challenging puzzles, explore mysteries, and uncover ancient mysteries to unlock new opportunities and achievements.

name: Mount and Journey
description:
The Mount and Journey mod is an exciting add-on for Terraria, designed for use with tModLoader. It offers players new ways to travel through the world of Terraria by adding unique mounts and travel enhancements.

New mounts:
The Mount and Journey mod offers a wide variety of new mounts to help you quickly navigate the world of Terraria. From magical creatures to technological devices, each mount has its own unique characteristics and abilities.
Unique travel enhancements:
The modification offers various improvements that will help you travel and explore the world of Terraria. Some of these include increased movement speed, the ability to overcome obstacles, and special skills that will help you in battles against enemies.
Crafting and progression:
The Mount and Journey mod offers new crafting recipes for mounts and upgrades, as well as a progression that allows you to gradually unlock new abilities and items as you progress in the game.

name: More Zenith Items
description:
MoreZenithItems is a mod for tModLoader that adds new items and expands the functionality of the legendary Zenith weapon in Terraria. This mod offers players more options to improve their strength and variety in battles against monsters and bosses.

New Zenith items: MoreZenithItems expands the collection of Zenith items, giving players more options to create and upgrade these powerful weapons. These new items may have unique abilities and effects that will help you in battle.
Improved Abilities: MoreZenithItems offers the ability to improve and customize Zenith with new items and recipes. You can enhance its damage, attack speed, range and other characteristics to become even stronger and more effective in battle.
New combo attacks: The MoreZenithItems mod adds new combo attacks and abilities for Zenith weapons. You will be able to use unique combinations of attacks and abilities to deal even more damage and destroy enemies with great efficiency.
Unique effects: MoreZenithItems offers new effects and abilities for Zenith weapons. You'll be able to deal extra damage, cause explosions, leave trails of fire, and more. These effects will help you cope with the most difficult opponents and bosses.
New materials and recipes: MoreZenithItems introduces new materials and recipes that will allow you to create and improve Zenith items. You will search and collect various resources to create the most powerful and effective items in the game.
List of new items in the MoreZenithItems mod:

Zenith of the Cosmos: A powerful weapon with a unique combo attack and the ability to cause meteor showers on enemies.
Zenith of the Inferno: A weapon that can deal fire damage and leave a trail of flames in its path.
Zenith of the Tides: A weapon that summons powerful water projectiles and creates waves of water that damage enemies.
Zenith of the Storm: A weapon that can summon lightning and create electrical discharges that strike enemies.
Zenith of the Void: A weapon that allows you to deal dark damage and create zones of darkness that damage enemies.

name: Unusacies' Battle Rods
description:
Unusacies' Battle Rods is a mod for tModLoader that adds unique and powerful fishing gear to the game world. These fishing tackles can be used in battle to fight enemies. The mod includes different types of fishing rods with unique abilities and attacks, allowing players to experiment with different strategies.

New fishing gear: The mod adds a variety of fishing gear that can be used as weapons to fight enemies.
Unique Abilities: Each fishing rod has its own abilities and attacks. Some can damage enemies, others can have effects such as poisoning or slowing down.
Strategic Approach: Players can experiment with different combinations of fishing gear to find the most effective battle strategy.
Compatibility with Other Mods: The Unusacies' Battle Rods mod is compatible with other mods installed in tModLoader, allowing players to enjoy new combat and fishing features at the same time.
Examples of fishing rods from the mod:

Lightning fishing rod: This fishing rod shoots lightning bolts at enemies, dealing electrical damage to them.
Ice fishing rod: With this fishing rod, players can throw frozen blocks of ice at enemies, slowing down their movement.
Poison fishing rod: A fishing rod that can fire poison arrows that deal damage over time.
Fire fishing rod: This fishing rod allows players to shoot fireballs at enemies, dealing fire damage to them.
These are just some examples of rods from the Unusacies' Battle Rods mod. There are many other unique fishing rods with different abilities that players can unlock and use in their adventures.

Unusacies' Battle Rods mod for tModLoader gives players the opportunity to use fishing tackle as weapons and enjoy a new type of combat in the game.

name: Vitality Mod (Blood Hunter Class)
description:
The Vitality Mod is a modification for the game Terraria that adds new items, mechanics, and content related to the player's health and stamina system. The mod is designed to enrich the gameplay and provide the player with more options to improve their stamina and vitality.

1. Basic Description:

Beta version of the Blood Hunter class
Suggestions for improving the class are accepted on Discord
Recognizing that a class may lack content at certain points in the progression
2. Added to the game:

Bosses: 8 new bosses with custom music
Classes: New class - Blood Hunter
NPC: 2 new NPCs added to cities
Enemies: 55 new enemies have been added to the game
Weapons: 300 new weapons
Tools: 50+ new tools
Armor: 30 new armor sets and 90+ individual items
Accessories: Over 50 new accessories
Resources: 2 new mined ores
Furniture: 2 new furniture sets
Materials: 50 new materials to work with
Ammo: 10+ new types of ammunition

name: Qwerty's Bosses and Items 2
description:
Qwerty's Bosses and Items 2 is a modification for the game Terraria that adds new bosses, items and mechanics to the game world.

New bosses:

The Megerdic Dragon is a fire-breathing dragon with deadly force.
Velgor is a powerful titan with the power of the earth.
The Spawn of Cthulhu is a subordinate of Cthulhu with terrible power.
The Executor is an evil jade statue that has come to life and is out for blood.
Barbaria is a fierce warrior with sinister weapons.
New items:

Several sets of armor with unique effects and bonuses.
Lots of new weapons including swords, bows, magic staffs and explosives.
Various accessories to improve your characteristics and increase the effectiveness of combat.
New consumable items such as potions and bombs.
Various decorative items and furniture for your home or fort.
Improved mechanics:

New events and boss challenges to keep you on your toes and maintain the challenge level.
Improved combat and character control mechanics.
New abilities and skills for your hero.
Increased difficulty level for draconic and titanic bosses.
A reworked crafting system that allows you to create more powerful items and equipment.

name: Deimos, the Starborn Princess
description:
Deimos, the Starborn Princess is a modification for the game Terraria that adds a new boss, weapons, armor and many other items.

New boss:

Deimos, the Starborn Princess is a new boss that looks like a large fairy character with colorful wings. She is a very powerful boss that can deal massive damage to your character.
New armor:

Starborn Armor is a set of armor made from a star meteorite. It gives the player resistance to fire and increases the player's magic damage.
Dawn Armor is a set of armor made from materials mined from Deimos. It gives the player resistance to fire and increases the player's defense.
New weapons:

Star Crossbow is a powerful weapon that shoots stars.
Dawn Staff is a magical staff that summons celestial creatures that will attack the player's enemies.
Starborn Sword is a sword that deals increased melee damage.
Dawn Blade is a sword that deals increased melee damage and increases the player's attack speed.
New items and accessories:

Starroot is a plant that provides the player with many beneficial properties.
The Starlight Powder Wand is an accessory that gives the player the ability to shoot stars.
Star Boots are an accessory that increases the player's movement speed.
Star Bracers are an accessory that increases the player's defense.
Starborn Ring is an accessory that increases magic damage and gives the player the ability to fly.
All of these items add new dimensions to the Terraria game and significantly expand the gameplay. This mod is ideal for players who are looking for new challenges and items in the game.

name: Project: Zero
description:
Project: Zero is a mod for tModLoader that adds new content to the game, designed for a more challenging and challenging gaming experience.

New Bosses: The mod adds many new bosses, each with their own unique battle mechanics.
New Items: There are a large number of new items that you can use to improve your character and fight bosses.
New Mobs: The modification introduces a number of new mobs that will populate various biomes as they progress in the game.
New Biomes: The mod adds new biomes that are distinguished by their unique atmosphere and contain new items, mini-bosses and bosses.
Night Scary Mode: This is a new game mode where players must survive the night while fighting waves of monsters bearing down on them.
List of nearby existing modifications within Project: Zero:

Project Zero: Awakening - This mod adds new bosses and items.
Project Zero: Ruins - This mod adds a new biome, which is the remains of an abandoned city.
Project Zero: Abyss - This mod adds a new biome, which consists of many underground caves and holes.
Project Zero: Frenzy - This mod adds a new game mode in which players need to deal with waves of monsters using new weapons and items.
Project Zero: Endgame - This mod adds new content for those who have already reached the end of the game's content, including new bosses, mechanics, and items.
Overall, Project Zero is a mod for people who want a more complex and challenging Terraria experience. It adds many new elements to the game such as items, bosses, mobs and biomes, which only increase the interest of the game and make for an even more exciting gameplay.

name: Dragon Lens
description:
DragonLens Mod is a mod for the game Terraria that adds a huge arsenal of weapons and items, as well as many new features that improve the integrity and playability of the game.

New Weapons and Items: The DragonLens Mod adds over 80 new items, including powerful beams, stunning spears, and unique bosses never seen before in the game.
Improved Professions: The DragonLens mod has improved professions, making it easier to get better weapons and armor.
New bonuses and skills: DragonLens Mod adds new bonuses and skills that help the player survive battles with bosses and other dangers.
Improved Game Mechanics: The mod also improves many aspects of the game, including item balance, controllability, and interface usability.

Iron Lead Sword
Royal rays

Shadow Weapons
Bone Dragon Shield
Cold Sword

Hot sword
DragonLens Mod is a great addition to the Terraria game that adds new elements to the gameplay and makes it more fun and interesting.

name: Blue Sky Ore
description:
Blue Sky Ore is a mod for TModLoader that adds a new mine with an unusual material - blue sky ore. This mod offers players a unique opportunity to create new items and various upgrades using Blue Sky Ore.

Weapons:
Blue Sky Pickaxe: A powerful weapon that can destroy blocks and attack enemies.
Blue Sky Saber: A sharp and fast sword that deals significant damage to opponents.
Blue Sky Arrow: Arrows that can be used with bows and crossbows to shoot enemies.
Armor:
Blue Sky Armor: Defensive equipment that increases the player's defense and attack power.
Blue Skyhelm: A headgear that provides additional bonuses to defense and abilities.
Tools:
Blue Sky Pickaxe: A tool for mining resources and breaking blocks.
Blue Sky Axe: An ax that can quickly cut down trees and destroy blocks.
Accessories:
Blue Sky Horseshoe: An accessory that increases the player's movement speed and jumping.
Blue Sky Necklace: A necklace that enhances the player's magical abilities.

name: Infinite Minions
description:
Infinite Minions is a mod for TModLoader that adds new minions and expands the functionality of existing minions in the game Terraria.

New minions:
Shadow Minion: This minion attacks enemies with shadow projectiles, dealing damage to them.
Fire Imp Minion: He can shoot fireballs at enemies.
Frost Hydra Minion: The minion releases ice heads that attack enemies.
Stardust Guardian Minion: This minion uses its lasers to disable enemies.
and others.
Improvements to existing minions:
New Abilities: Each minion gains new unique abilities and attacks, allowing them to be more useful in battle.
More interactions: You can set different operating modes for minions and give them commands to control their behavior.
Improved Equipment: You can find new items and equipment that will improve your minions and make them even stronger.
New items:
Summoner Armor: New armor sets for summoners that increase the power and effectiveness of minions.
Summoner Accessories: Additional accessories that provide bonuses to summoning minions.
Summoner Weapons: New weapons specifically designed for use with minions.
Balance and fixes:
The mod makes various bug fixes and balances minion and item abilities to provide a fairer gaming environment.

name: Elaina: Wandering Witch
description:
Elaina: Wandering Witch is a mod for TModLoader that adds a new character named Elaina and related elements to the world of Terraria. In this mod, you can immerse yourself in an exciting adventure with Elaina, a traveling sorceress, and explore new locations, meet unique NPCs, get new items and complete new tasks.

New character: Elaina - Elaina is the main character of the mod. She is a sorceress who has unique abilities and skills. You have to go with Elaina on exciting journeys throughout the world of Terraria.
New Locations: The mod adds new exciting locations that you can explore with Elaina. You will explore mysterious forests, dangerous dungeons, majestic castles and much more.
New NPCs: There will be new NPCs in the mod that you can interact with. You have to help them, complete tasks, explore their stories and learn new information about the world of Terraria.
New Items and Equipment: New items and equipment will be available to you that can be used in battles and adventures. New swords, spells, armor and accessories will help you become stronger and more effective in battle.
New tasks: The mod will offer you new tasks that you will need to complete. They will help you advance in the history of the mod, open up new opportunities and reveal the secrets of the world of Terraria.

name: Whips & more
description:
Whips & More is a mod for tModLoader that adds different types of whips and other items to the Terraria game. This mod allows players to use whips as weapons to attack enemies and control the situation on the battlefield.

Scourges of different types: the mod adds many new scourges with different characteristics and abilities. Some of them may have great length, others may have high damage or special effects on impact.
Improved Whips: The mod also offers an upgrade system for whips. Players can find or craft items that allow them to upgrade their whips, adding new properties and increasing damage.
Special Effects: The Whips & More mod adds various special effects to whips. For example, some whips can leave trails of fire on the ground, dealing extra damage to enemies, or cause lightning to strike upon impact.
New Items and Accessories: In addition to whips, the mod also adds new items and accessories that help enhance the gaming experience. For example, you can find items that increase the speed of the whip or provide protection from damage.
Using Scourges in Boss Battles: With the new Scourges, players can diversify their tactics and fighting style against bosses. Whips allow you to attack enemies from afar and control your character at the same time, making it easier to fight powerful opponents.
Compatible with Other Mods: Whips & More is compatible with other tModLoader mods, allowing players to enjoy additional features and functionality along with other mods.

name: Terra Guardians
description:
TerraGuardians Mod is a mod for the game Terraria, designed to be used with tModLoader. It adds new content to the game in the form of "protectors" - characters who can join you as companions and helpers on your adventures.

Defenders:
TerraGuardians are special characters that can be summoned and join you in the game. Each defender has his own unique appearance, personality, abilities and skills.
Defenders can be customized and equipped with a variety of items, weapons, and armor.
They can perform various tasks such as fighting enemies, collecting resources, building, and even trading with you.
Each defender has their own unique story and tasks that you can complete with them.
Interaction and commands:
You can interact with defenders, talk to them, ask them questions and give commands.
You can select and customize commands for the defenders, such as following you, defending, attacking, or waiting in a specific location.
Protectors can also offer you tips and tricks, as well as give you information about the world and its inhabitants.
Progress and development:
You can develop and improve defenders, increasing their level and skills as you progress in the game.
There is a system of friendship with defenders that allows you to strengthen your bond with them and unlock new opportunities and bonuses.
You can also find special items and equipment that will help improve your defenders.

name: Zenith Progression
description:
Zenith is the most powerful weapon in the game and can only be obtained when there is nowhere else to use it.

Perhaps you, like me, enjoy its mechanics and would like to play with it in a normal way. That's why I decided to create this mod, which allows you to get a weakened version of this sword on the first night by crafting it on an anvil of 10 fallen stars. Although the sword is weak, it can be improved simply by dealing damage. By right-clicking Zenith in your inventory, you can choose which stat will be improved, such as damage or attack speed. This way you can play through the entire game with it, gradually improving it, and it will eventually become much stronger than the original if you don't get bored. The configuration will help you get the right experience from this mod.

Increasing your critical strike chance above 100% makes sense since the excess chance increases the ultimate damage.

name: Bumblebirb Pet
description:
Bumblebirb Pet is a mod for Terraria that adds a new companion to the game - a fluffy yellow bird named Bumblebirb. This pet will follow you as you explore the world of Terraria and provide additional passive benefits.

Adding a Bumblebirb pet that follows the player and attacks enemies.
Bumblebirb has two different attacks: a regular beak attack and a special attack that summons a cloud of slowly falling feathers that damage enemies.
Bumblebirb can also help the player by collecting items that are within his reach.
The mod adds a new food recipe made from Bumblebirb eggs, which restores the player's health and increases running speed for a short time.
The player can purchase Bumblebirb from an NPC merchant who appears after the player kills a certain boss.

name: imkSushi's
description:
The modification was developed and released by imkSushi and can be installed via tModLoader.

This mod is a mod with the best additional recipes. It makes equivalent ores and ingots interchangeable and adds recipes for items that depend on world generation. It also improves multiplayer and allows players to avoid using other worlds to obtain items such as red and rotten coral, Shadow Orbs or Dungeon Chests, and much more. Try it! This mod was also one of the first mods for tModLoader! You can also melt armor, tools and even iron doors in the smelter! Now with even more stuff! More than just recipes.

name: Lobotomy Corporation
description:
The Lobotomy Mod adds content inspired by Lobotomy Corporation to the game. This modification adds new items, enemies and bosses, as well as gameplay mechanics that are reminiscent of those of Lobotomy Corporation.

New bosses - for example, the Anomaly "Big Bird" and "Apostle".
New items such as weapons and armor that are based on the Anomalies from Lobotomy Corporation.
New gameplay mechanics such as the Anomaly management system and the blocking system.
New music tracks - which were taken from Lobotomy Corporation.
Lobotomy Mod is a fairly large modification that adds a lot of new content and gameplay mechanics to the game, which make it more interesting and varied.

name: Weapon Enchantments
description:
Weapon Enchantments is a modification for the game Terraria that adds new weapon enchantments. These enchantments can significantly improve the power and effectiveness of weapons, making combat more interesting and varied.

Item Customization: Mod adds a system enchantments, which allows you to customize your items. You can upgrade damage, critical strike chance, defense, life-stealing ability and much more.
Item progression: The Item Experience system allows you to save your progress when changing or upgrading equipment. Now you can develop your favorite items throughout the game.
Upgrading Items: Mod adds a function infusion, which allows you to upgrade your weapons and armor with special resources.
Here are some of the features available in Weapon Enchantments:

Item Enchantment: Customize your items with a variety of effects, from basic upgrades to unique abilities.
Item Experience System: Your equipment gains experience when you use it. This allows you to save your progress when changing items.
Infusion: Upgrade your items with special resources to make them even more powerful.
Weapon Enchantments is a great way to customize your Terraria experience and make it more unique!

name: Craftable Accessories
description:
Craftable Accessories is a mod for TModLoader that adds new accessories to the game that can be crafted from available materials. These accessories can help you increase your speed, strength, defense, and many other stats.

Speed ​​accessories
Blitz Boots - increases movement speed by 15%
Angel Treads - increases movement speed by 15%, provides immunity to swamp and lava
Protection Accessories
Granite Energy Core - increases defense by 6
Ice Shield - Increases defense by 5 and grants immunity to freezing.
Lava Waders - increases defense by 5 and grants immunity to lava
Accessories to improve combat abilities
Sniper Scope - increases firing range by 10% and increases critical damage by 10%
Celestial Shell - increases magical and physical power by 10% and grants immunity to swamp and lava
Accessories to improve survivability
Arctic Diving Gear - grants underwater breathing and freeze immunity
Obsidian Rose - Reduces lava damage by 30%
Ankh Shield - Grants immunity to many negative effects such as poison, bleed and fire strike
Each of these accessories can be crafted from specific materials, such as obsidian, granite, lava ore, and other resources. Using this mod, you can create powerful accessories that will help you pass difficult levels and protect yourself from enemies.

name: MrPlague's Authentic Races
description:
MrPlague's Authentic Races is a mod for Terraria that adds new playable races, abilities, and items.

New races:

Goblins: Goblins can craft items that are not available to other races. They can also find treasures and open chests faster.
Monsters: Monsters can deal more damage than other races. They also have the ability to turn into crystals, which can heal from damage.
Elves: Elves can run and jump faster than other races. They also have the ability to heal from damage while on the ground.
Cows: Cows can craft items faster than other races. They can also receive additional benefits from milk consumption.
New items:

Fury Stone: This item gives the player the ability to deal more damage and increases attack speed.
Stone of Wisdom: This item gives the player the ability to increase the damage of magical attacks and increases the maximum mana pool.
Stone of Tranquility: This item gives the player the ability to slow down enemies and reduce damage taken.
Speed ​​Stone: This item gives the player the ability to move quickly and increases running speed.
New abilities:

Goblins can use the Complete Missions ability to receive quests from NPCs and earn rewards.
Monsters can use the Polymorph ability to become crystal and heal from damage.
Elves can use the Forest Spirit ability to summon a forest spirit that attacks enemies.
Cows can use the Milk Collection ability to receive additional bonuses from milk.

name: Mech Bosses Rework
description:
Mech Bosses Rework is a mod for the game Terraria that reworks the combat system of three mechanical bosses - The Twins, The Destroyer and Skeletron Prime. The modification makes changes to the mechanics of their attacks, increases the difficulty of battles and provides players with new opportunities for battles.

The Twins now fire more powerful lasers that can hit multiple targets. They have also received a new attack that can cause a lot of damage if the player does not dodge it in time.
The Destroyer has received a new ability - a grenade launcher. This attack fires a group of mini grenades that deal high damage within the blast radius.
Skeletron Prime can now fire explosive bombs that damage the player and surrounding objects. He also received a new attack - a laser sword that deals damage over a wide area and can be reflected from walls.
In addition, the modification includes new items that players can use to increase their effectiveness in battles against mechanical bosses. For example, the item "Worm Scarf" can reduce damage taken from bosses, and "Destroyer's Resonance" increases the damage the player deals when using melee weapons.

name: Retribution Mod
description:
Retribution Mod is a modification for the game Terraria that adds new bosses, weapons, armor, items and other gameplay elements to the game. The mod is quite large and can provide players with additional hours of gameplay.

Some of the key features of Retribution Mod include:

New bosses:
Fate of the Ancients
Arcanum Predator
Eye of Chaos
Mordoran
Mad Shaman
Red King
And many others.
New weapons and armor:
Weapons and armor that can be crafted from new materials obtained from bosses and other sources.
New magic spells and skills for the player.
New items:
Various items that can help players in battles and improve their performance.
New decorations and accessories to enhance the gaming experience.
New Enemies:
New mobs that can be found in different biomes.
Various fixes and changes:
Bug fixes and gameplay improvements.
Improved graphics and sound effects.

name: Universe of Swords Reborn
description:
Universe of Swords Reborn is a mod for Terraria that adds new weapons, armor, items, bosses, and more to the game.

Here is a list of some features of the Universe of Swords Reborn mod:

Over 100 new swords have been added, each with their own unique designs and abilities.
New armor and accessories that increase the player's abilities and give them new abilities.
New bosses that must be defeated to gain access to better weapons and armor.
New blocks and items to decorate the base and create new mechanisms.
The new class is the Wizard, who uses magic to fight opponents.
In addition, the Universe of Swords Reborn mod has support for mods from other authors, which allows you to use it together with other mods and create new combinations for more interesting gameplay.

Thorium Mod
Calamity mod
