Fargo's Mutant Mod
Redemption Mod
The Universe of Swords Reborn mod for tModLoader is a great addition to Terraria that offers more content and options for players.

name: Hypnos in Calamity
description:
Hypnos is a boss monster in the Calamity mod for Terraria using tModLoader. This boss is located in the astral dimension and is one of the more difficult bosses in the mod.

Hypnos has 5 different battle phases, each with its own unique abilities and attacks.
During battle, Hypnos creates rings of energy that can damage the player if they pass through him.
Hypnos can create spheres that bounce off walls and deal great damage upon contact with the player.
He can also use teleportation to move around the battlefield and attack the player from unexpected directions.
Hypnos has a high defense rate, making him very difficult to kill.
To defeat Hypnos, players will need to use a well-prepared set of equipment and weapons, as well as carefully study its attacks and battle phases. Here are some useful items and things that can help in the battle against Hypnos:

Changing the armor to one that has a high level of protection and bonuses for damage or resistance.
Using weapons with high attack speed and damage, such as swords or maces.
Using offensive and defensive items such as bombs or cloaks that increase the player's defense and attack abilities.
Using items that can weaken the enemy's defenses, such as potions and projectiles.

name: Calamity Craftable Shrine Items
description:
Calamity Craftable Shrine Items is a mod for tModLoader that adds new items to the game related to Cataclysm, one of the most famous mods for Terraria.

The mod features various new items that can be crafted in the Sanctuary, including the following:

Scroll of Cursed Earth
Locket of Lost Will
Eye of the Colossus
Mirror Arena
Shimmering Crystal
Seal of Creeping Shadows
Seal of the Ancient One
Amulet of Awakening
Helm of Omnipotence
These items are designed to enhance the Cataclysm gaming experience by adding new mechanics and functionality that will help players combat new challenges and enemies.

Additionally, the mod also adds new materials that can be used to craft these items, including Solar Steel, Wavering Fragments, and Broken Idols.

name: Calamity Flamethrowers
description:
Calamity Flamethrowers is a mod for tModLoader that adds several new weapons to the Terraria game. They are flamethrowers with various effects that allow players to destroy enemies and fight bosses.

Incendiary Flare: This is the first flamethrower to be added to the game. It fires flaming projectiles that damage and set enemies on fire.
The Storm Weaver's Flame: This flameweaver has a high rate of fire and deals high damage. It also creates electrical discharges that increase damage.
Elemental Eruption: This flamethrower is capable of releasing a fireball that explodes upon contact with an enemy or surface. This weapon deals a lot of damage and can be useful in boss battles.
Dragon's Breath: This flamethrower shoots fireballs that fly in a zigzag pattern. When they hit an enemy, they deal a lot of damage and set them on fire.
Nebula Blaze: This flamethrower fires cosmic projectiles that deal damage and create bubble rainbow effects.
The Devourer's Hunger: This flamethrower deals high damage and creates toxic clouds. He can also set enemies on fire.
Omega Biome Blade: This flamethrower is one of the most powerful in the game. It fires a storm of energy that deals massive damage and can destroy even the toughest bosses.
These flamethrowers can be created using various materials found in the game. In addition, they can be modified to give them additional effects and increase their power.

name: Calamity Ranger Expansion
description:
Calamity Ranger Expansion is a mod for TModLoader that expands the gameplay in Terraria by adding new classes and items for archers.

New Classes: The Calamity Ranger Expansion adds two new classes - Hunter and Crossbowman. Both classes use the bow and crossbow as their primary weapons, but have unique abilities and skills.
New Items: The mod adds many new items for archers, including bows, crossbows, arrows, armor and accessories. Many of these items have unique properties, such as the ability to fire multiple arrows at once or deal extra damage.
New Bosses: The Calamity Ranger Expansion includes several new bosses that can only be summoned and defeated using new items added in the mod.
New Worlds: The mod adds several new worlds to explore and fight with new monsters and bosses.
Expanded Gameplay: Calamity Ranger Expansion expands Terraria's gameplay by adding new features and functionality such as an improved interface, new character abilities, and more.
Compatibility with other mods: The mod is compatible with other TModLoader mods, allowing players to create a unique gaming experience by combining different mods.
Overall, Calamity Ranger Expansion is a great mod for archer lovers in Terraria that adds a lot of new features and functionality to the game.

name: Unofficial Calamity Whips
description:
Unofficial Calamity Whips is a modification for Tmodloader that adds new whips and related items to the game. These new items are very powerful and can help you in your battle against bosses and other dangers.

Thread of Fate: This whip is the first of the new whips and can be crafted using the crafting table. It has high damage and is able to wrap itself around enemies.
Emerald Water Whip: This whip can be found in the Black Jungle and has high attack speed, but slightly lower damage than other whips.
Corrupted Blood Whip: This whip can be crafted from items found in the Corrupted World. It has very high damage, but is a bit slower than other whips.
Celestial Radiance Whip: This whip can be crafted from items found in the Celestial World. It has very high damage and can wrap around enemies.
Pure Soul Whip: This whip can be crafted from items found in the Spirit World. It has very high damage and can create a shield that protects the player.
These are just some of the new items added to Unofficial Calamity Whips. To create most of them you will need to use various materials and crafting machines. The mod also has new mobs and bosses that can drop additional items that are needed to create whips.

Unofficial Calamity Whips is a great mod that adds new content to the game and gives players even more options for dealing with the dangers in the world of Terraria.

name: JoJo Stands
description:
JoJoStands is a modification for TmodLoader that adds elements and mechanics from the Japanese anime series "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure" to the game.

The modification contains the following stands and their abilities:

Star Platinum is a fast and powerful Stand that can stop time for a short period of time.
The World is a Stand similar to Star Platinum, but with a longer ability to stop time.
Crazy Diamond is a Stand that can restore destroyed objects and heal wounds.
Killer Queen is a Stand that can create bombs from any object, and also has the ability to destroy anything that touches its "bombs".
Gold Experience is a Stand that can transform any objects into living organisms, and also has the ability to create "life energy".
Sticky Fingers is a Stand that can create lightning bolts from zippers on its body, and can also create zippers on any objects.
Aerosmith is a Stand that can fly and fire an automatic cannon.
Sex Pistols is a stand consisting of 6 small stands that can control bullets.
Magician's Red is a Stand that can create and control fire.
Hierophant Green is a Stand that can create and manipulate electricity.
In addition, the modification adds many new items and blocks related to the anime series, such as:

Gold Experience life energy that can be used to heal or transform objects into living beings.
Joseph's pickaxe, which can be used to create various items and blocks.
An automatic carpet that can be used to move around the map.
A large stone that can be used to create a Stand Joystick.
Overall, JoJoStands is a great addition to TmodLoader that adds many interesting elements and mechanics from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

name: Aequus
description:
Aequus is a modification for TModLoader that adds new items, mobs, bosses and other features to the game.

New items:
Elven Bow: A powerful weapon that can fire quickly and deal great damage.
Weapon of the Order: a sword with high damage and the ability to heal the player.
Temple Guardian: An accessory that gives the player additional protection and the ability to create barriers.
Alchemist Jar: An item that allows the player to create potions on the go.
New mobs:
Ice Spiders: Mobs that live in ice caves and can freeze the player.
Mechanical Skeletons: Mobs that are stronger versions of normal skeletons.
Headless Horseman: A boss that can appear randomly and is a very dangerous opponent.
New biomes:
Ice Caves: A new biome that can be found in snow biomes and contains ice spiders and other monsters.
Abandoned Temple: A new biome that can be found in the jungle and contains many traps and treasures.
New blocks:
Stone Columns: A decorative block that can be used to create buildings and other structures.
Marble Blocks: A decorative block that can be used to create buildings and other structures.
These are just some of the main features of the Aequus mod. If you love playing Terraria and want to add new elements and features to it, then Aequus mod can be a great choice for you.

name: Terrarian's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Terrarian's Bizarre Adventure (TBA) is a mod for the game Terraria developed for TModLoader. It adds new gameplay elements to the game such as new bosses, enemies, weapons, and mechanics.

New Bosses: The mod adds several new bosses, each with unique battle mechanics. For example, a ghost boss that can walk through walls and deal damage from afar.
New Enemies: TBA adds a variety of new enemies to the game that present a challenge to even the most experienced players. For example, one of the enemies can create copies of itself, making it difficult to defeat.
New Weapons: The mod adds many new weapons, each with unique abilities and special effects. For example, a sword that can create portals or a bow that can shoot multiple arrows at the same time.
New Mechanics: TBA adds new mechanics to the game that will help players pass even the most difficult levels. For example, a new type of block that allows players to move through walls.
New Items: The mod adds new items to the game that can be used to create new items and upgrade existing ones. For example, new ingredients that can be used to create more powerful weapons.
New Music: TBA adds new music to the game that will help players immerse themselves in the game world and create an atmosphere of adventure.
Overall, Terrarian's Bizarre Adventure is a great mod for Terraria that adds a lot of new gameplay elements to the game and allows players to enjoy the game even more.

name: Calamity Mod Infernum Mode
description:
Calamity Mod Infernum Mode is a modification for TModLoader that adds an extremely difficult game mode to the popular Calamity mod. This mode increases the difficulty of the game, adds new equipment and much more.

Additional difficulties for bosses: Each boss has increased health and damage, as well as new attacks and abilities. Bosses also have improved rewards for defeating them.
New equipment: Infernum Mode adds many new items including weapons, armor, accessories and more. Some of these items can only be obtained by defeating difficult bosses.
Increased difficulty level for mobs: Many mobs in Calamity Mod Infernum Mode also have increased health and damage, making them much more dangerous to the player.
New recipes: Infernum Mode has added many new recipes for crafting items that are not available in the regular version of Calamity.
New biomes: New biomes have been added to the modification, each of which has its own characteristics and dangers.
Improved multiplayer: Infernum Mode includes an improved multiplayer mode that allows players to fight more effectively with increased difficulty.
As you can see from the list, Calamity Mod Infernum Mode is a very challenging game mode that adds a lot of new elements to Calamity Mod. It is created for players who are looking for a new level of challenge and adventure in Terraria.

name: The Clicker Class
description:
The Clicker Class is a mod for tModLoader that adds a new weapon classification to the Terraria game. Instead of relying on traditional swords and bows, this weapon class is entirely mouse-based.

Here are some of the features the mod provides:

New Weapons: The mod adds many new items that belong to the click class. They can be obtained both during the passage of the main game and during the passage of mods.
Skills: In addition to new weapons, the mod also adds skills that can be used in battle. Some of these skills include summoning small minions, creating snaps that explode on contact with an enemy, and increasing attack speed.
Accessories: To improve the effectiveness of the Click class, the mod adds new accessories that improve various stats such as attack speed and damage.
Clicker Table: The mod also includes an interface called Clicker Table, which can be used to create and upgrade click weapons. This allows players to create unique click weapons that suit their gaming style.
Expandability: Like most Terraria mods, The Clicker Class can also be extended with other mods to create an even more unique gaming experience.
List of some weapons added by the mod:

True Strike Clicker: Creates multiple small clicks that damage enemies.
Night Vision Clicker: Creates a radius of light around the player, allowing them to see in the dark.
Explosive Clicker: Creates clickers that explode on contact with an enemy.
The Clicker: Creates a powerful click that deals great damage to enemies.
Clicker's Tome: Grants an additional skill that increases attack speed when using a click weapon.

name: Alchemist NPC Lite
description:
AlchemistNPC Lite is a Terraria mod available through TModLoader that adds many new items, blocks, and features related to alchemy and crafting.

Below is a list of some of the main features and objects added to the mod:

New Items and Recipes: The mod adds over 200 new items and recipes that can be used to create various items and effects. Some of these items include metamorphic stones, dyes, ore mining tools, unique weapons and armor, and more.
Alchemy Lab: The mod adds an alchemy lab that allows players to create various items and effects using ingredients and recipes they find as they progress through the game.
Large number of new NPCs: The mod adds more than 20 new NPCs that provide players with various services and abilities. Some of these NPCs include a merchant who sells new items, an alchemist who offers various services, and a treasure hunter who will help players find rare items.
New Mechanics and Improvements: The mod also includes many new mechanics and gameplay improvements, including new bosses and events, changes to crafting mechanics, more challenging game modes, and more.
Compact Version: AlchemistNPC Lite is a simplified version of the mod that only adds some of its main features and objects. This makes the mod lighter and faster, which can be useful for players who want to use some of the mod's features but don't want to download too many new items and objects.
This is just a small overview of the AlchemistNPC Lite mod for Terraria, and it contains many other features and objects that may be useful for players. If you are interested in alchemy and crafting in Terraria, then this mod could be a great addition to your gaming experience.

name: Camping
description:
The “Camping” mod for tModLoader adds a new way of surviving in the wild to the game. It adds new items, blocks and mechanics that allow the player to create a camp and survive in it for a long time.

The mod introduces a new type of item - camping equipment, which allows the player to create different types of shelters and camps. All camping gear can be crafted from new materials that can be obtained in the game.

New blocks appear in the mod, such as tents, fires, barbecues and much more. The player can use these blocks to create their own camp and defend against enemies.

The mod also adds a new mechanic - survival mode. In this mode, the player must survive in the wild, collect resources and build his camp. The mod also introduces new mobs that can attack the player, and new tasks that the player must complete to receive rewards.

In addition, the Camping mod adds a new food and sleep system. The player must monitor his food and sleep needs to avoid dying from hunger or fatigue.

Overall, the Camping mod adds a new and interesting way of surviving in the wild to the game, which allows the player to create his own camp and protect himself from enemies.

name: Meac Mod
description:
"Meac mod" for the game Terraria is a modification that adds new items, bosses and combat mechanics to the game.

Melee:
True Evening Sword and its upgrades
Katana
Ice Blade
Frostfire Sword
Ice thorn
Shadow Spear
cobalt sword
copper sword
sacred sword
True Holy Sword
Scythe of death
Storm Lance (buffed twice after Pygron)
Melee Damage Mechanics:
Putting on different gloves to enhance the damage mechanics
Bosses:
Recycled Brain of Cthulhu
Magic Eye Twins
hidden boss
However, at the moment Meac Mod demo for Terraria is in open testing and may contain flaws, imbalances and lack of some features. In the future, the modification will be refined and expanded to include:

Recycling weapons of other classes
Improved Melee Mechanics
Addition of new reworked bosses and bosses that appear after some time.
To use "Meac mod" you need to first install a mod management program such as tModLoader. Then download "Meac mod" and activate it in your mod manager.

name: Camera Enhancements
description:
The Camera Enhancement Mod for Terraria offers the user the ability to significantly improve the visual experience in the game by providing a number of customizable features for the camera. This mod allows players to customize the camera so that it works perfectly with their playstyle and preferences.

Mouse effect: Allows the camera to follow the mouse pointer, making interaction with the game world more interactive.
Smoothness: Smoothes out camera movement, allowing it to follow the player smoothly. Can be customized to suit your playing style.
Fixation: Makes it possible to temporarily fix the camera on a player using a hotkey, ignoring any displacement.
Offset (X, Y): Allows you to add camera offset in the X and Y axes, which is especially useful for creating unique camera angles.
Dynamic offsets: Allows the camera to automatically pan in the direction the player is moving, maintaining immersion.
Screen shake: Creates screen shake when certain events occur, such as explosions, adding an extra level of realism.
Each of these features can be customized to your liking, providing flexibility and meeting the needs of different players. In addition, the mod is compatible with most other modifications, except those that completely change the position of the screen.

name: Better Russian Font
description:
Better Russian Font is a mod for tModLoader, which replaces the standard Russian font in Terraria with a beautiful Cyrillic version of the Andy Bold font (the same font used for English text in the game).

This font fits perfectly into the atmosphere of the game and, most importantly, does not cause discomfort when reading. Here are the main features of the mod:

Visual improvements: The mod gives the game a more pleasant and readable Russian font.
Client side: The mod works on the client side.
Compatibility: Supported tModLoader version 1.4.3 and 1.4.4.
File Size: The size of the mod is 37,956 MB.
Better Russian Font - a great way to make the gaming experience in Terraria more comfortable for Russian-speaking players!

name: True Tooltips
description:
True Tooltips is a fully customizable mod designed to improve Terraria's tooltips. With this mod, you have full control over the color scheme, placement, and content of your tooltips, making your gaming experience more personalized and convenient.

Changing the Color and Disabling Vanilla Hint Lines:
You can change colors or disable most vanilla tooltip lines. Set alpha to 0 to disable the line completely.
Setting the Line Position and Spacing for each Tooltip:
Change the position and line spacing of each tooltip to suit your preferences.
Tooltip Lines:

Shows the name, quantity and rarity of ammo, as well as the mod that adds ammo if the "Mod name next to item name" option is enabled. Also displays the ammo an item needs if the item has no ammo. Works with fishing rods and magic sticks.
Improved price line
Correct sale price for custom priced items, always visible, better color coding, cleaner. Replaces the vanilla price line.
Shows the number of attacks per second. Replaces the vanilla speed string.
Displays the speed of the item. May not always be accurate due to items firing different projectiles, changing speed in flight, etc.
Shows repulsion as a number. Replaces the vanilla push string.
Combines the damage and speed of weapons and ammo, and also combines the damage and speed of weapons and ammo if the "Best Knockback String" option is enabled.
Additional Features:

Shows the full-size sprite of the item.
Displays the mod that adds the item next to the item's name.
Adds a background to tooltips.
Changes the structure of tooltips for easier reading.
Gives the text that appears when hovering over items with special rarities in the inventory or hotbar the correct color and displays the item name in the foreground instead of the background.
Allows you to disable text blinking.

name: Hat Simulator
description:
"Hat Simulator" is a mod that mainly adds hats from Team Fortress 2, but also a few others inspired by cosmetics from other games or whatever looks cool. Each hat added by this mod also has its own "Unusual" version.

Town NPC:
Hat Salesman - Hat Seller:
Sells keys for opening hat boxes.
40+ Appearance Items:
Wide Range of Hats:
Over 40 cosmetic items, including hats inspired by cosmetic items from Team Fortress 2 and other games.
Hat Lock Boxes:
Boxes with Hat:
Dropped by enemies after killing Eater of Worlds or Brain of Cthulu.
There are 4 Hat Crates that can be opened to obtain different sets of hats. To open the Hat Box, you need a key, which can be purchased from the Hat Salesman.
There is a small chance to receive a hat with an unusual effect after opening the Hat Box.
Notes: Cosmetic items include hats inspired by cosmetics from Team Fortress 2 and other games. Crates with Hats will drop from enemies after killing Eater of Worlds or Brain of Cthulu. Open Hat Boxes using keys purchased from the Hat Seller. Small chance to get a hat with an unusual effect after opening a box. The boxes are called Hat Boxes to match Terraria's naming style.

Welcome to the wonderful world of “More Beams” - a mod for TModLoader, which is designed to enrich the world of Terraria with additional beams for all types of wood that are missing in the standard version of the game. Special thanks to Ezren and PossiblyBlu3 for creating the sprites that give the game a new visual experience!

Variety of wooden beams: Added beams for all types of wood, which were not present in the original game. Now your construction arsenal has become even more diverse.
Update 0.3: There are beams for gray brick, stone slab, decorative dynastic tree, and new scary and standard dynastic trees. The old scary and dynastic beams are still available, just show off some new options.
Pros of the “More Beams” mod:

Unique Visual Experience: New beams add an extra element of style and creativity to your builds.
Preservation of Traditions: Older beam options are still available, maintaining the authenticity of your previous designs.
Comprehensive Update: Update 0.3 introduced new beam options, adding even more options to your buildings.

name: Team Spectate
description:
The Team Spectate mod for tModLoader is an innovative addition to your Terraria multiplayer experience. Now you can watch your teammates' screens, immersing yourself in their adventures and facilitating cooperative interaction.

Ally Observation:
The mod allows you to view the screens of your team members in real time.
This feature is activated in a multiplayer game, and the menu button is located below the command selector.
Interface and interaction:
The menu button is located below the command selector and is activated when the corresponding command is selected.
If you encounter problems or find errors, it is recommended to contact the developer via Discord[discord.gg].
The mod is also open source on GitHub[github.com] and you are invited to check it out if you have a GitHub account.
Special thanks:
The developer thanks Mirsario for fixing the unloaded chunks.
Thanks to pollen__ for providing the player mapping code.
Thanks to bafto for testing the multiplayer mode.
Principle of operation:

Start of observation:
You can activate spectate mode by clicking on a player button other than your own.
To exit spectate mode, press the player button again or return to your character.
Limitations:
You cannot watch dead players, those who are on the other team, or those who do not exist.
All players can watch those who are not attached to any team.
If you can't watch a player, their player head button will turn grey.
Switch between players:
You can also switch between different players using a hotkey, which must be configured before use.
Boss Observation:
The mod also provides the ability to observe bosses by clicking on the corresponding button in the menu.

name: Fancy Whips
description:
Introducing the Fancy Whips mod, the perfect way to add some virtuosity and beauty to your Terraria whips! This mod transforms the visual effects of the whips, making each strike a spectacular display of skill and style.

Improved Visualization:
Each whip blow is accompanied by additional visual effects that highlight the dynamism and beauty of the attack.
Setting Influence on Hitbox:
By default, the visual hitbox of the whip strike is changed, making it more effective.
In the mod settings you can disable hitbox changes if you prefer standard game mechanics.
Compatibility with Modified Whips:
The mod is now fully compatible with whips from other mods, including Arsenal, Catalyst, Whips & More.
Testing has shown compatibility with many other modifications that expand the arsenal of weapons.

name: Not Safe For Terraria
description:
Warning: This modification is intended for adults only. If you are a minor or if you or someone else has been offended, please refrain from using this mod. The warning notice is serious. You are given to know.

Modification features:

This mod adds new opportunities for player interaction in NSFW (18+) format with NPCs of the vanilla city.
To start interacting, you need to bind a hotkey.
Approach an NPC with a high happiness level to initiate a dialogue.
Some NPCs are prohibited from interacting.
Note:

Currently there is only one interaction available between male and female characters.
The modification does not contradict LGBTQ+ principles, it’s just that the range of possibilities is limited in the current version of the mod.
Both male and female characters are supported.
The following NPCs are not supported:

Angler
A princess
Innkeeper
Truffle
Please note that some male NPCs' heads may not be aligned correctly during animation.

Instructions for use:

Customize the interaction key to suit your preferences.
Approach the appropriate NPC in the city and press the bound key to begin interaction.
When your bar (depending on your gender) reaches above 80%, click the heart icon.
Once the animation is complete, press the interaction key to repeat the interaction, or wait 2 seconds to stop it.
Please keep in mind that if this mod is available on the Steam Workshop for a certain period of time, I may consider updating its content.

Note: The modification has not been tested for use in multi-user mode. There are no plans for multiplayer interactions yet.

name: Dialogue Panel Rework
description:
"Dialogue Panel Rework" is a mod for tModLoader that reworks the game's dialogue panel, providing players with an improved and more user-friendly interface for interacting with NPCs (non-player characters) and reading dialogue.

Key features of the Dialogue Panel Rework mod include:

Improved design and visual presentation: The mod updates the visual style of the dialog panel, making it more modern and attractive. The new design includes improved icons, fonts, color scheme and layout. This creates a more pleasing visual experience and improves the readability of dialogue.
Improved navigation and usability: The mod makes changes to the dialog panel interface to make it easier to navigate and use. For example, new buttons are added to quickly navigate through conversations or return to previous messages. The mod may also offer improved filters or search tools so that players can quickly find the information they need in dialogues.
Additional features and settings: "Dialogue Panel Rework" can expand the functionality of the dialog panel by adding new features and settings. For example, a mod might offer the ability to mark important conversations or add notes so players can easily return to them later. The mod may also offer settings to change the size or position of the dialog panel to better suit the player's individual preferences.

name: Heart Crystal & Life Fruit Glow
description:
“Heart Crystal & Life Fruit Glow” is a mod for tModLoader that gives a special glow effect to the hearts and life fruits in the game. This mod improves the visual aspect of the gameplay by making the hearts and life fruits more visible and attractive.

The main features of the Heart Crystal & Life Fruit Glow mod include:

Glow of hearts: The modification adds a glow effect to the hearts that the player can collect to increase his health. Now the hearts will glow brightly, making them more visible and attractive to the player.
Glow fruit of life: The mod also gives a special glow effect to the fruits of life, which the player can collect to increase their maximum health. Thanks to this effect, the fruit of life will stand out and attract the player's attention.
Improved visual experience: The modification significantly improves the visual aspect of the game, making hearts and fruits of life more vibrant and attractive. This adds an additional aesthetic component to the gameplay, making the game more enjoyable and exciting.
The “Heart Crystal & Life Fruit Glow” mod enriches the gaming experience by adding a glow effect to hearts and life fruits. If you want to add an extra visual element to the game, this mod will be a great addition for you.

name: Better Blending
description:
The "Better Blending" mod is a mod for tModLoader that changes the way tiles are blended in the game, specifically focusing on environmental tile blending. This mod allows you to create more natural and connected worlds where different types of tiles can be mixed to create more harmonious combinations.

Key features of the Better Blending mod include:

Mixing environment: The modification allows you to mix different types of environment tiles to make the world look more uniform and continuous. For example, ores can be mixed with stone, ice, or other ores, and sandstone, granite, and marble can be mixed with stone, dirt, and grass.
Simplified construction: Modification makes it easier to mix building blocks while maintaining their original properties. This allows builders to create more complex and interesting structures without disturbing the original tile combinations.
More natural worlds: Modification creates more natural worlds where different environmental elements can mix organically. This helps make the world less divided and more harmonious.
The Better Blending mod significantly improves the tile blending system in the tModLoader game. If you want to create more realistic and connected worlds, this mod will be a great addition for you.

name: Biome Titles
description:
Biome Titles is a mod for tModLoader that adds informational titles that display the current biome the player is in in the game Terraria. This mod provides useful information to players about what biome they are in, which can be especially useful when exploring the world or searching for specific resources.

Biome Information Headers: The mod adds informational headers that display the name of the current biome the player is in. These headings appear at the top of the screen and can be customized in size and position.
Support for different biomes: Biome Titles supports various biomes including forests, deserts, jungles, snow biomes, dungeons and more. When the player enters a new biome, the title automatically updates to display the corresponding name.
Header customization: The mod also offers some settings to customize biome headers. You can adjust the size and position of the titles on the screen to suit your preferences. Additionally, you can choose which biomes should be displayed and customize the title text style.
Convenience and information content: Biome Titles make it much easier for players to identify the current biome they are in. This is especially useful when searching for certain resources, such as ores or plants, which may be limited to certain biomes.

name: Boss Intros
description:
Boss Intros is an exciting mod for tModLoader that adds impressive and memorable intros for bosses in the game Terraria. The mod allows players to enjoy an improved and more epic boss battle experience by adding additional visuals and atmosphere to their appearance.

Impressive animations: Boss Intros introduces new animations and visual effects that accompany the appearance of each boss. As you approach the boss encounter, the mod includes a great intro that adds extra epicness and tension to the battle.
Unique sound effects: The mod also adds new sound effects that accompany the introduction of bosses. They add extra atmosphere and intensity to battles, making every boss encounter unforgettable.
Customization and flexibility: Boss Intros offers settings that allow you to customize and tailor the visuals and sound effects to suit your preferences. You can choose different styles and intro options to create a unique visual experience for each boss.

name: zzp198's WeaponOut Lite
description:
zzp198's WeaponOut Lite is a mod for tModLoader that adds new features and mechanics to the combat system of the Terraria game. This mod allows players to enjoy enhanced combat skills and a variety of weapons to take on the challenges in the world of Terraria.

Improved attacks and combos: The "zzp198's WeaponOut Lite" mod adds new attacks and combos that allow players to diversify their combat tactics and increase their effectiveness in battle. Now you can use more powerful and effective attacks to deal with your enemies.
New weapons: The mod offers a variety of new weapons, including swords, spears, axes and more. Each weapon has its own unique characteristics and abilities, allowing you to choose the right weapon for different situations.
Improved animations: Zzp198's WeaponOut Lite mod also offers improved animations for weapons, making combat scenes more cinematic and exciting. You will enjoy smoother movements and special effects during battles.
Settings and compatibility: Zzp198's WeaponOut Lite mod offers various settings that allow you to customize the gaming experience to suit your preferences. Moreover, it is compatible with other mods, allowing you to enjoy new weapons and features in combination with other mods.

name: Improved Movement Visuals
description:
Improved Movement Visuals (IMV) is a modification for TmodLoader that improves the movement visuals in Terraria. This mod gives additional smoothness and realism to the character animation, as well as to various moving objects in the game world.

Key features of the Improved Movement Visuals mod include:

Improved Character Animation: This mod adds additional frames of animation and changes the character's ability to move around the world. Now the character's movement will become smoother and more pleasing to the eye.
Support for moving objects: IMV also improves the animation of mechanisms, vehicles and other moving objects in the world of Terraria. This could include expanding character wing animations when flying on aircraft, or more detailed wheel animations on mechanical devices.
Realistic motion effects: The modification offers more realistic motion effects for characters, including animation of hair, fabrics on clothes, objects swaying in a bag when moving, etc. All this makes the game world more picturesque and immersive.
Configuration and Settings: IMV provides various settings to allow players to customize the animations to their liking. This includes animation speed, effect intensity, and other parameters that allow you to customize the mod to your personal preferences.
Please note that the Improved Movement Visuals mod does not affect game mechanics or balance, but only offers visual improvements. It is not compatible with other mods that change the game's animations and requires TmodLoader to install.

name: Fancy Lighting
description:
Fancy Lighting is a mod for the game Terraria via the tModLoader mod manager that adds a number of visual lighting effects to the game.

Here are some of the features of the Fancy Lighting mod:

More realistic lighting in caves and dungeons - the mod adds shadows and reflections that make places more picturesque and realistic.
More dynamic lighting - The mod allows you to set lighting effects that change brightness and color depending on the time of day or even your current biome.
New Light Blocks - The mod adds several new light blocks, including lamps, torches and lamps, which allow you to create more beautiful and aesthetic buildings.
New Light Effects – The mod adds various light effects such as starry skies, light flickering and light spots that add an additional visual element to the game.
Multiple Mod Supports - The mod is compatible with many other mods, allowing you to create more beautiful and unique worlds to play Terraria.
Overall, Fancy Lighting is a great mod for anyone who wants to improve the visual experience of playing Terraria. If you love beautiful lighting and want to add some new effects to the game, then this mod is perfect for you.

name: Bosses As NPCs
description:
"Bosses As NPCs" is a mod for tModLoader, a popular modding platform for Terraria. This mod allows players to turn game bosses into non-player characters (NPCs) who can appear in your world and interact with you and other NPCs.

"Bosses As NPCs" is a mod that adds an interesting element to the world of Terraria, allowing you to transform powerful bosses into friendly non-player characters. Now you can see your former enemies in a whole new light, interact with them and even invite them into your home.

Main Features:

Turning bosses into NPCs: After defeating the boss, you have the opportunity to turn him into an NPC who will live in the world and act as an ordinary villager. This creates a unique atmosphere and allows you to better understand the world of Terraria and its inhabitants.
Interactivity: Transformed bosses will interact with you and other NPCs. You can talk to them, ask questions, and complete various tasks or requests that are related to their past lives as bosses.
Unique items and tasks: Each transformed boss can offer you unique tasks or trade. They can offer you special items that were previously unavailable, or start a chain of quests that reveal more information about the game world.
Friendly meetings: Encounters with former bosses, now turned into NPCs, can lead to interesting dialogues and even help expand the game's plot. It can also provide you with new opportunities to explore and interact with the world.
Visual changes: Transformed bosses may have some changes to their appearance to highlight their new NPC status. This may include changes in appearance, clothing or accessories.
Settings and options: The mod may provide options to customize which bosses can be transformed into NPCs, as well as what additional abilities they provide once transformed.

name: Dragons Decorative
description:
Dragons Decorative Mod is a modification for the game Terraria that adds a variety of dragon-themed decorative elements to the game world. They can be used to decorate your buildings and create an epic atmosphere in the game.

Decorative blocks:
Dragon Statues: Small or large dragon statues that can be placed in your home or garden.
Dragon Torches: Various types of torches with dragon designs to light up your spaces.
Dragon Carpets: Carpets with dragon designs that can be used for floor decoration.
Furniture:
Dragon trophies: heads and other parts of dragons that can be hung on the walls.
Dragon Chairs and Tables: Dragon themed furniture to decorate your home or bar.
Dragon Bed: A bed with a dragon pattern for your character.
Weapons and armor:
Dragon Helmets and Armor: Equipment made from dragon scales that provides additional protection and unique abilities.
Dragon Blade: A powerful weapon crafted from dragon parts, capable of dealing significant damage to enemies.
Various items:
Dragon Egg: A decorative item that can be placed in your home or used as a rare crafting item.
Dragon Amulet: An accessory that increases your character's strength and stamina.

name: Loot Beams
description:
Loot Beams is a modification (mod) for tModLoader that adds visual effects to the Terraria game to highlight and highlight falling items or valuable resources. Instead of just lying on the ground, these items will be accompanied by bright beams of light that will attract your attention and help you find your valuables.

Vivid Visual Effects: When an object falls to the ground, it will be surrounded by a bright beam of light, which makes it stand out and visible even from a far distance. This is especially useful when you are looking for rare items or valuable resources.
Customizable Settings: The Loot Beams mod allows you to customize various aspects of the beams, including color, intensity, and duration. You can choose the settings that best suit your preferences and play style.
Different types of rays: The mod includes several types of rays that you can choose from. For example, there are beams for different classes of items such as weapons, armor, accessories and tools. You can also customize different colors for different types of items to better organize your collection.
Compatibility with Other Mods: Loot Beams is compatible with most other tModLoader mods, allowing you to enjoy beam visuals with all the items and resources that other mods add. This makes the mod even more useful and interesting to use.
Here are some of the list of available settings for the Loot Beams mod:

Beam Color: You can select a beam color from a palette or specify your own RGB code.
Beam Intensity: You can adjust the brightness and intensity of the beam.
Beam Duration: You can specify how long the beam will remain visible after an object is dropped.

name: Better Boss Health Bar
description:
Better Boss Health Bar is a modification for TModLoader that improves the display of the health of bosses in the game Terraria. It provides additional information elements and improves the visual presentation of the boss's health bar, making the gameplay more informative and convenient.

Improved Health Bar: The modification provides a more detailed and informative health bar for bosses. Instead of a simple health bar, you will get additional information such as the boss's name, current health percentage, and the boss's total health.
Additional Icons: Better Boss Health Bar mod adds boss icons that are displayed next to the health bar. These icons help you easily recognize the boss you're fighting, even if you're not familiar with all their names.
Dynamic Update: The boss's health bar updates in real time, displaying the boss's current health status. You can easily track the progress of your fight and see how much health the boss has left.
Personalization: The modification provides the ability to customize the appearance of the health bar and boss icons. You can choose different colors, textures and styles to tailor the interface to your preferences.

name: Armament Display
description:
ArmamentDisplay is a mod for tModLoader that adds displays to the Terraria game to display information about your weapons. It provides players with additional weapon information such as damage, attack speed, range, mana cost, and other stats.

Weapon information display: The mod adds special displays that display information about your current weapon. You will be able to see data such as weapon damage, attack speed, attack type, damage per second and other characteristics.
Compact Interface: Weapon information displays are compact and easy to use. They can be placed in different parts of the screen so as not to interfere with the gameplay.
Customization: The mod allows you to customize the appearance and position of weapon information displays. You can change their size, color, transparency and much more to tailor them to your preferences.
Multi-core support: The mod is fully compatible with multiplayer and supports displaying weapon information for each player individually. This way, each player can only see data about their weapon.
Compatibility with other mods: ArmamentDisplay is compatible with most other Terraria mods, allowing you to get information about the characteristics of weapons from various modifications.

name: Cooler Item Visual Effect
description:
Display of weapons held in hands has been implemented. Since modified weapons are implemented in different ways, this mod may not be adaptable to all modified weapons.

Added cooler impact effects (weapon hitbox changed).

Also added an unrealized weapon called FirstFractal. And lots of cool weapons - CooooolWeapons. Maybe next time I'll modify the magic, ranged, and summoning weapon visuals (this may take a few months since I have a lot of other things to do).

name: Melee Effects + mod
description:
Melee Effects is a mod for tModLoader that adds various effects to melee combat in Terraria. These effects can range from increasing damage and attack speed to adding additional projectiles and increasing attack range.

Some of the main effects this mod adds are:

Fire: Adds extra fire damage to attacks
Ice: Slows down enemies and adds a chance to freeze
Poison: Poisons enemies and deals additional damage over time
Electricity: Deals extra damage and has a chance to be electrocuted.
Light: Deals extra damage and illuminates dark areas
Additionally, this mod adds several new weapons and items that use these effects. For example, "Flaming Blade" is a sword that deals fire damage, and "Frozen Spear" is a spear that slows down enemies.

Here is the full list of effects that can be found in this mod:

Fire
Ice
Poison
Electricity
World
Bleeding
Explosion
Deadly poison
Hell's Flame
Element
Night vision
Through
Invulnerability
Overall, Melee Effects is a fun and useful mod that adds more variety to melee combat in Terraria and gives players more options when dealing with enemies.

name: Biome display
description:
Biome Display is a mod for Terraria that allows players to see different biomes on the map in real time.

The main function of the mod is to display various biomes on the map, such as jungles, deserts, oceans and others. Each biome is displayed in a specific color, making them easy to distinguish. Additionally, the mod allows players to display different types of blocks on the map, such as minerals, ores, root systems, and others.

Here are some of the main features and capabilities of the Biome Display mod:

Display biomes on the map in real time.
Display different types of blocks on the map.
Easy to use and install.
Ability to customize colors for each biome and block type.
Supports many languages.

name: Better Zoom
description:
Better Zoom is a mod for the game Terraria that adds the ability to change the zoom level of the camera in the game. This mod allows players to take a closer look at the game world, including various objects and creatures.

Clicking on the "Zoom" or "UIScale" text next to the sliders will reset the value to 100%. You can switch between the slider and the exact input value using the toggle button next to the "Zoom" header. The text field only accepts 3 digits, and after pressing Enter or clicking somewhere else, the change will be saved.

Important: You can enter any three-digit number in the text field, including incorrect ones, which may result in an error.

Zoom: Changing the zoom slider or pressing the "+" or "-" keys on your keyboard (not the numeric keypad) will zoom the game in or out, but instead of changing the zoom from 100% to 200%, you can change it from 30% to 1000%.

When you zoom out, no further tile loading occurs. It's not a mistake!

UI Scale (UIScale): You can now change the UI scale from 30% to 600%. You can also change it by holding down the Shift key and pressing "+" or "-" on your keyboard.

Mod settings:

Background Scale (default: "off"): This toggles whether the background should be scaled too.

Cursor Scale (Default: 1x): This changes the size of your cursor.

Minimum Zoom (Default: 0,3x): This changes the minimum zoom you can set.

Maximum Zoom (Default: 10x): This changes the maximum zoom you can set.

name: Colored Calamity Relics
description:
Colored Calamity Relics is a mod for Terraria that adds new items - colorful relics - that are designed to be used in conjunction with other mods, including the Calamity Mod.

Fire Relic: Increases damage from fire and flames, and also gives the player fire protection.
Ice Relic: Increases damage from ice and snow, and also gives the player protection from ice.
Relic of Darkness: Increases damage from dark spells and gives the player dark protection.
Relic of Light: Increases light damage and gives the player light protection.
Relic of Heaven: Increases damage from celestial items and gives the player protection from damage from celestial objects.
Biome Relic: Increases damage from biomes such as jungles, deserts, and ancient forests, and also gives the player protection from damage dealt by these biomes.
Gravity Relic: Changes the player's gravity, allowing them to fly and move up and down.
Relic of Time: Slows down time, giving the player an advantage in battle and making it easier to avoid danger.
Relic of Life: Increases the player's maximum life and restores their health over time.
This is just a small list of added items; there are many more of them in the mod. In addition, the mod provides the ability to create crafting recipes for all items, as well as custom settings for each relic to set your preferences in the game.

name: Lights And Shadow
description:
Lights And Shadows is a mod for TModLoader that adds many new lighting and shadow elements to the game to create a more realistic and atmospheric atmosphere.

List of main features of the Lights And Shadows mod:

Realistic Shadows: The mod adds a new shadow system that allows you to create more realistic and detailed shadows for all objects in the game, including the player, monsters, items and the environment.
New Light Sources: The mod adds new types of light sources such as candles, lanterns and bonfires, which can be used to create a more interesting and beautiful atmosphere around the player's base or in other locations.
Dynamic Lighting: The mod also includes a dynamic lighting system that allows objects to react to light sources in real time. This means that objects close to the light source will be illuminated brighter than objects in the shadows.

name: Immersive Projector
description:
The Immersive Projector is a modification for the game Terraria that adds a new device to the game - a projector that allows you to project images onto walls, ceilings and floors. This can be useful for creating decorative elements, creating maps and signs, and creating interactive scenarios.

Main features of the Immersive Projector mod:

Adds a new block to the game - Immersive Projector.
Allows you to create projections of images on walls, ceilings and floors.
Can be used to create decorative items and create maps and signs.
Allows you to create interactive scenarios, for example the projector can be configured to project text when activated by a wire signal.
The mod can be used for both single player and multiplayer games.
Below are some of the main features of Immersive Projector:

Designing images on walls, ceilings and floors.
Creating creative cards and signs for the terrarium.
Create interactive scenarios, such as wire-triggered scenarios.
Customizable image size.
Adjustable projection angle.
Ability to create multiple projections simultaneously.
Ability to export and import projections to files.
Support for online multiplayer play.
In addition, Immersive Projector also supports various other features such as using wire signals to control the projector, support for custom textures, and adjusting the projection quality.

To install Immersive Projector, you need to install TModLoader (this is a tool that allows you to manage modifications in Terraria). After installing TModLoader, you can download Immersive Projector from the TModLoader online mod store or manually download and install the mod.

name: Spirit Mod
description:
Spirit Mod is one of the most popular third-party mods for the game Terraria, which adds many new features, items and bosses to the game. It is created by the Terraria player community and contains a large amount of content that can enhance the gameplay and add new features for players.

New biomes and locations — the mod adds new biomes and locations to the game, such as the foggy swamp, the garden kingdom and others. Each biome contains unique items and creatures that can be used by the player.
New items and equipment - the mod adds many new items and equipment that can be used by the player. Some of them can only be obtained in certain biomes or through boss battles.
New bosses - The mod adds several new bosses to the game that can be summoned and fought. Each boss has its own unique attacks and items that can be obtained when defeating it.
Improved interface — the mod contains an improved interface with a large number of settings and options that can be customized to suit your needs.
Many other features - The mod also adds many other features such as new NPCs, quests and much more.
1401 new items!
41 new armor sets!
8 new bosses!
3 brand new biomes: Spirit, Asteroid Field and Briar Rose!
Complete rework of the Ocean biome!
A completely new quest system!
255 new enemies and mini-bosses!
3 new events: Tide, Helium Flood and Mystic Moon!
New weapon enchantment system!
34 brand new music tracks for vanilla and modified events and biomes! ...and much more to discover!
Featuring a variety of bosses, biomes, weapons, events and mechanics, Spirit is one of the largest content mods for Terraria. Spirit has been developed by a team of enthusiastic modders since 2015 with the goal of expanding the vanilla experience and breathing new immersive life into your world. Since then, the mod has continued to grow and evolve, with over 3 million downloads in its lifetime on version 1.3.5. After another long update, Spirit is ready to take on the challenge of version 1.4.4 and show what it can do in the future.

name: Mod Marks
description:
“The 'Material Mod Marks' mod is your personal assistant in exploration and crafting in Terraria! By adding a small visual cue to each material, this mod provides information about the mods that recipes belong to.

Benefits of use:

Convenient visual display of materials belonging to mods.
It is recommended to customize the mod configuration for a better gaming experience.
Features of the mod currently include:

Fully compatible with most content mods.
Limited compatibility with other mods.
Customizable configuration options.
Important to note: no small icons for mods. This mod relies on mods to have a built-in small icon, usually used for a bestiary, to show the mod's identifiability in the game. Many mods, especially those that add simple quality of life items, do not have this icon and instead receive a placeholder (one of the 'Missing Icons' shown above). Some mods may get support for their own icons. This currently includes: | LuiAFK Reborn, Magic Storage, Quality Of Terraria, imkSushi's Mod, AlchemistNPCLite, More Beams, Dragon's Decorative Mod, Summoner's Accosiation, Gadget Galore, The Clicker Class, Orchid Mineshaft."

Here is a list of materials and their mods:

Mod: LuiAFK Reborn
Material 1
Material 2
Material 3
Mod: Magic Storage
Material A
Material B
Material C
Mod: Quality Of Terraria
Material X
Material Y
Material Z

Dragon Scale material
Dragon Claw Material

Mod: Summoner's Accosiation
Summoner's Token Material
Summoner's Charm material
Summoner's Emblem Material

Material Gadget B

Mod: The Clicker Class
Clicker Shard Material
Clicker Core Material
Clicker Essence Material
Mod: Orchid Mineshaft
Orchid Crystal material
Material Orchid Ore
Orchid Ingot material

name: Familiar Vanity Set on Spawn
description:
Familiar Vanity Set on Spawn (FVSOS) is a mod that allows you to create a Familiar Vanity Set right when you spawn!

Features:

No materials required.
No workbench required.
No progress required.
Just go to your world and craft it! It's so simple!

Additional features:

Characters that have already been created are supported, no need to create a new one!

name: Persistent Summons
description:
"Persistent Summons" is a utility mod for Terraria that allows minions to remain when the player dies and respawns. There is no need to re-summon your minions over and over again. You can still dispel any of your minions manually by right-clicking on the corresponding minion buff, just like in normal play. No additional setup or steps are required.

Officially supports:

All minions from the original version of the game
All minions from the Thorium mod
74/80 minions from the Calamity mod
All minions from the Spirit mod
Although these mods are the only ones with hardcoded support, it can still work with other mods. If you have other mods you would like added, please leave a comment on the Workshop page.

name: Widgets mod
description:
The Widgets Mod is an innovative expansion for Terraria designed to enhance the gameplay experience by adding handy widgets that provide the player with additional information about their character and the world around them.

Positioning mode
Activate positioning mode by pressing the hotkey (Settings >> Controls >> Keybindings >> Manage Mods >> Widgets: Positioning Mode) to begin customizing the widgets' layout. In this mode, you can move widgets by dragging them or using a special widget. Their positions are automatically saved in a separate configuration file.

Widgets
Ammo display
Shows the quantity, name, rarity and image of the current item's ammunition. Displayed only if the item has ammunition.
Breath and Lava Immunity Panel
Displays your breath reserve and immunity to lava. Replaces the analogue in the game, if not disabled.
Buff display
Shows the current and maximum number of buffs to the right of the last buff received.
Flight time panel
Shows flight time as a bar and the number of additional jumps as a number. The strip also works with jumps, most vehicles, rocket boots, and the flying carpet.
Healing Display
Shows the healing percentage of your best healing item. Displayed only if it is possible to use a healing item and if the percentage is greater than or equal to that specified in the configuration.
Health panel
Displays your health. You can choose the percentage at which it appears.
Invulnerability Time Panel
Displays your invulnerability time.
Mana display
Shows the number of uses remaining on your current item before running out of mana, or displays your mana as a bar.
Minion display
Shows the current and maximum number of minions.
Positioning widget
Moves the last widget you selected in position mode by one pixel in the appropriate direction, or continues moving continuously while holding the button. Also displays widget coordinates.
Real time clock
Shows the current real time. You can choose from 12 formats.
Display of guard creatures
Shows the current and maximum number of guard creatures.

name: Echo Housing Utilities
description:
Open up new horizons of possibilities in the world of Terraria with the help of the Echo Housing Utilities mod! This mod allows you to build houses for NPCs more freely by adding several new blocks and items.

Imaginary Echo Blocks: Imagine being able to create invisible blocks that can also serve as doors and provide all the necessary living conditions for NPCs. This is an ideal solution for creating unique rooms, such as tents or houses, that have an immersive connection to the outside world.
Compact ghost furniture: Gain access to a set of compact ghost furniture that allows you to bypass various NPC housing checks. These invisible items such as doors, chairs and tables will help you make efficient use of space and create cozy homes for your population.
Selling Echo items from the artist: You can now access building blocks and other Echo items by talking to the artist in the graveyard. This allows you to have access to these items early in the game.
Compatible with other mods: The mod is compatible with several other modifications, allowing you to enjoy new features in combination with your other favorite mods.

name: Every Weapon is Craftable
description:
Transform your Terraria gaming experience with the amazing Every Weapon is Craftable mod! This mod adds crafting recipes for each type of weapon in the game, making access to your favorite types of combat tools easier and more convenient. You no longer need to rely on random drops or long searches - just craft the right weapon and go into battle!

Recipes for each weapon: Enjoy a variety of weapons including swords, bows, magic staves and more with added crafting recipes. Now you can easily craft any weapon you want without having to wait for random monster drops or explore worlds for rare items.
Early access to weapons: The mod also provides access to some weapons earlier than intended in the original game. This helps players enjoy more varied and interesting gameplay, starting with more powerful weapons earlier in the game.
New items in recipes: In addition to crafting recipes for weapons, the mod includes several new items used in the process of creating certain types of weapons. This allows you to increase the depth and complexity of crafting, making the gameplay even more exciting and varied.

name: Roommates
description:
Want to create your own small community in the world of Terraria? "Roommates" is a mod for tModLoader that allows multiple NPCs to inhabit the same room. An unlimited number of NPCs can live together in the same room, as long as you have suitable housing. A unique feature allows NPCs to independently move into already inhabited houses, making your world even more alive and interesting.

Features:

Allows multiple NPCs to inhabit the same room.
There is no limit to the number of NPCs that can live together in the same house.
You just need to have a suitable home to move into.
NPCs are able to move into already inhabited houses themselves, creating a dynamic environment.
Advantages:

Cohabitation: Now you can see your favorite NPCs sharing a room, interacting and creating unique situations.
Limitless possibilities: There is no limit to the number of NPCs in one room, allowing you to create a variety of communities and places to live.
Autonomous behavior: NPCs can decide to move into already occupied houses, adding realism and dynamism to your Terraria world.

name: Affe's Death Counter
description:
Affe's Death Counter mod for tModLoader: Displays the total number of deaths with customizable options for a personalized gaming experience. Keep track of your deaths with additional settings and detailed statistics.

The "affe's Death Counter" modification is designed for the game Terraria using the tModLoader platform. This mod allows players to track their total number of deaths in the game, offering customizable settings to create a unique gaming experience.

The main functions:
Death counter display: Users can see their death counter under the map/health interface or as a pop-up text.
Text settings: The ability to adjust the text size, its position on the screen, and also lock the display position.
Toggle the visibility of the death counter: The death count can be displayed as part of the UI or as text bubbles. This function can be switched.
Easy to add and remove: The mod can be added or removed at any time without interrupting the gameplay.
Cause of Death Tracking: Viewing detailed information about the causes of deaths in the game is available via a hotkey, providing more detailed information about your deaths.

Additional features:
Displaying the death counter with information accessories: Option to display death counter with accessories like Tally Counter or better (including REK 3000, PDA, Cell Phone, Shellphone), which can be toggled in settings.

name: Angler Shops Alternative
description:
"Angler Shops Alternative" is a unique modification for tModLoader that expands the capabilities of the NPC Angler in Terraria by adding two new shops with a variety of items.

“Angler Shops Alternative” is a modification based on the original “Angler Shop” mod. It offers players more flexibility and options by adding two new shops for the NPC Angler. These shops include many items that were previously only available through completing quests, such as the Fishing Bobbler, Bottomless Bucket of Honey, Honey Absorbing Sponge, and other quest rewards.

Features:
Two shops for NPC Angler: This allows you to add missing items including the Fishing Bobbler, Bottomless Honey Bucket, Honey Absorbing Sponge, and other quest rewards.
Blocking some items behind bosses: The mod adds the option to block some items behind bosses in the Mod configuration.
Dialogue Panel Rework Mod Compatibility: Fully compatible with the Dialogue Panel Rework mod.
Setting up a custom currency: When enabled in the mod configuration, a custom currency (Angler coins) will be enabled for two Angler stores.

name: Microdungeons And More — A Worldgen
description:
“Microdungeons And More - A Worldgen Mod” is a modification for tModLoader that enriches the world of Terraria with new structures and world generation elements, making each playthrough unique.

“Microdungeons And More - A Worldgen Mod” is a JustImpaxim creation for tModLoader that brings new elements and structures to Terraria, making each game more exciting.

Current content:
Plains/Canyons: Deep chasms that cut through the surface and extend deep into the earth.
Ice Fortresses: Micro-dungeons full of treasures and traps hidden in icy biomes.
Abandoned Hellevators: Vertical structures found underground.
Underground Lakes: Vast bodies of water that can be found underground.
Golden Lake: An underground lake filled with honey and gold.
Punished Church: A micro-dungeon generated in Hell.

name: Fast Fall
description:
"Transform your Terraria experience with the Fast Fall Mod! Add the ability to quickly fall down by pressing the DOWN button, like in many other 2D platformers. Highly customizable and easy to use."

Fast Fall is a simple but effective modification for Terraria that adds the ability to quickly fall down, like many other 2D platformers. This feature makes movement through the world more fluid and dynamic, allowing players to quickly move between levels and overcome obstacles without unnecessary effort.

Features:
Fast fall: Simply press the DOWN button to instantly speed up your descent, allowing you to quickly progress through the world of Terraria.
Highly customizable: The modification offers a wide range of settings, allowing players to adjust the speed and other parameters of the fast fall to suit their individual preferences.

name: InfraSonic (tVoice)
description:
"InfraSonic" is an innovative modification for Terraria that offers a unique opportunity to communicate directly in the game without the need to use third-party programs. With InfraSonic, you can interact harmoniously with your friends, share strategies and coordinate actions without being distracted from the gameplay.

Features:
Basic voice chat: Similar to the features available in CSGO, InfraSonic provides an easy and reliable way to communicate within the game.
Positional effect: Player voices will be spatially positioned, adding realism and depth to your interactions in the world of Terraria.

Benefits of use:
Automatically lower the background music volume: Background Music Ducking automatically reduces the volume of background music during calls, ensuring clear and understandable conversations.
Dynamic sound attenuation: Players' voices will be adjusted based on the distance between them, creating a surprisingly realistic gaming atmosphere.

name: Custom Zone Titles
description:
Extend the functionality of Biome Titles with the "Custom Zone Titles" modification for tModLoader, allowing you to assign unique titles to zones of your choice. Create your own titles and personalize your Terraria world!

Custom Zone Titles are an integral addition to Biome Titles, allowing you to create unique, custom-titled zones in your Terraria world.

Features:
Assigning titles to zones: Now you can easily create and name zones in your world. Highlight important places or buildings by giving them unique titles.
Intuitive interface: Creating and editing zones is carried out using a convenient interface that does not require much effort. Just drag, click and enjoy your personalized zones.
Resourceless creation: You don't need any additional resources to create zones. Just use the workbench and your ideas!

name: JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation
description:
JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation (Generation from JereTheJuggler) is a mod for tModLoader, which enriches the world generation process in Terraria.

Unique structures: The mod adds a variety of structures, ranging from small cosmetic changes to full-fledged new objects that will help you progress through the game.
Diversity: You'll find everything here - from underground traps to huge bones and abandoned mines.
Integration with vanilla blocks: The mod uses only vanilla blocks and items, which allows you to preserve the atmosphere of Terraria.
Setting: You can turn each feature on and off through the in-game settings menu.

Here are some of the implemented features:
Hanging Spiked Traps: New traps hidden in dungeons.
Towers in snow biomes: Small towers protecting snow biomes.
Giant worm teeth: Teeth protruding from walls in the Blackness.
Giant Bones: Shattered bones in the Red biome.
Additional Gems: Risky opportunities to get extra jewelry.
Abandoned mines: Huge mines in the depths of the cave layer.
piers: Piers for fishing on the ocean.
Flower biome: Flower fertilizer has brought results.
Custom rails for minecarts: Are you ready for an adrenaline rush?
Hell's houses: Because hell hasn't been evil enough yet.
JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation - a great way to make the world of Terraria more unique and interesting!

name: Thorium + Calamity Convergence REDUX
description:
Thorium + Calamity Convergence Mod REDUX is a mod for tModLoader, which combines two popular mods: Thorium + Calamity.

Improved Progression: The mod reduces the redundancy that occurs when both mods do essentially the same thing. There are now new recipe trees, sometimes even completely new recipes for items. And finally there are no identical recipes for vertebrae and skin!
Combination of Classes: Class progression has been revised. For example, Angel Threads are now available after Plantera, and Terrarium Particle Sprinters и Seraph Tracers enter into the normal progression.
Authors: Original author of the mod - kittenchilly, and it is supported zriverazrty. The mod has also been fixed by the team LuiAFK Reborn.
Recommendations: Since this may contradict much of what is written in both wikis, it is recommended to use Management for new recipes or Recipe Browserif you prefer it.
Thorium + Calamity Convergence Mod REDUX is a great way to improve your gaming experience if you want to play with both mods at the same time!

name: Automation & Defense
description:
Welcome to the world of incredible automation and defense with the Automation & Defense mod for Terraria. This technology mod is designed to satisfy the passion for automation and is inspired by the Create Mod in Minecraft. Let's plunge into the world of innovation!

Transport System:
	Item Transporter:
		Moves objects by emulating a pipeline system. Easily connects to Funnel for extract/insert as well as Splitter/Merger.
	Item Funnel:
		Acts as an extractor and inserter, depending on the direction of the connected Transporter. Interactive only with chests.
		Ability to set a filter for extraction mode.
	Splitter & Merger:
		Two functions in one. Splitter and combiner in one bottle.
		When exiting in a certain direction:
		If you have a filter installed, the item will preferentially be directed in the appropriate direction, otherwise they will be evenly distributed in all directions.
Automation System:
	Stone Generator:
		Continuously generates stone blocks, directing them to the chest nearby.
	Ore Extractor:
		Extracts ores (...by magic) from stone blocks.
		Required: Pickaxe (power determines which ores can be extracted), input chest with stone blocks, output chest to store ores.
		Possibility of installing a filter so that only specific ore is extracted. Otherwise, all ores are extracted randomly (1% chance per stone block).
Automatic Crafter:
	Periodically creates items.
	Required: Recipe item, associated crafting stations, input chest with ingredients, output chest to store crafted items.
	Items with proximity conditions to water/honey/lava can be crafted for free. Items that require Demon Altar are not supported (unless you have another mod that adds an item to place altars, but I haven't tested).
Wood Cleaner:
	Retrieves wood and sends it to the Wood Harvester Base below. Can be placed on top of each other to create a long line.
Wood Cleaner Base:
	Stores wood from cleaners above it. Sends the wood to the chest next to her.
Item Vacuum:
	Collects items around him and places them in chests on both sides.
	The radius can be increased/decreased.

Defense System:
Magic Tower:
	Automatically picks up bullets from chests near her to shoot nearby enemies. Average speed and low damage.
	Added a new recipe for Musket Ball (requires any iron ingots) so that most bullets in the game can be automated using the Auto Crafter.

name: Nitrate (Performance Optimizer)
description:
Nitrate (Performance Optimizer) is a mod for Terraria created to significantly improve the game's performance by introducing extensive optimizations to various functions. The mod takes advantage of parallelism, SIMD instructions, GPU rendering and other modern technical solutions designed to increase the speed and stability of the gameplay.

Please note:
Nitrate is in early development; Some features may not be compatible with other mods.
Balance between performance and accuracy: We strive to find the perfect balance between game speed and visual fidelity.
Save Security: Your saves should be safe, but visual distortions and glitches may occur.

Main characteristics of the mod:
	Dust particle processing: Rewritten and optimized for GPU, which significantly increases performance (requires testing with modified particles).
	Parallelization of particle update: Increases game speed by simultaneous processing.
	Rain visualization on GPU: optimized so that most of the processing occurs on the video card (may not work correctly with mods that change the textures or color of rain).
	Parallelization of rain update: Increase productivity through more efficient processing.
	Replacing FNA types with SIMD: Important parts of the code now use JIT internal SIMD types to optimize execution.
	Tiled rendering and lighting: rewritten to be chunk-based and partially processed on the GPU (the current version may have bugs, for example, when using spelunker potions).

name: Better Autosave
description:
“Best AutoSave” is a modification for the famous platformer Terraria, created to work with tModLoader. It is an advanced autosave tool that allows players to customize autosave intervals in both single player and multiplayer.

Mod features:
Independent installation on servers and clients.
Single and Multiplayer Configuration:
	In a single player game and on servers, you can set the frequency of autosaving of the world and character (by default, every 10 minutes).
	In multiplayer, the frequency of saving the client character is adjusted (by default, every 5 minutes).
Ability to specify the autosave interval for the world on the server (regardless of the game, where autosave occurs once per game day).
Additional notes:
Single player mode requires the Autosave setting to be enabled in the game settings.
Automatic saving of the world on servers occurs once per game day, despite the mod settings.
The minimum possible autosave interval is 10 seconds, which is due to game stability reasons.

name: Better Treasure Bag Loot
description:
Better Treasure Bag Loot is a mod for tModLoader that optimizes the item drop rates of vanilla Treasure Bags and Master items (pets and mounts) so that you don't have to kill the boss over and over again to get a single reward.

Boss Pets and Mounts:
Drop rate set to 100%
All treasure bags:
Includes the corresponding boss trophy
King Slime Treasure Bag:
Slimy Saddle drop rate set to 100%
The Ninja set will drop entirely
Eye of Cthulhu Treasure Bag:
Most crimtane/demonite ores will drop (87 pieces)
Dirklops Treasure Bag:
The Eye Bone, Eye Umbrella and Radio Item will all drop out entirely.
The above items will be randomly attached to the additional item (for compatibility with other mods)
Wall of Flesh Treasure Bag:
All four emblems will drop in one piece
Emblems will be randomly attached to an additional item (especially for Calamity)
Queen Slime Treasure Bag:
Gelatinous Pillion drop rate set to 100%
Hook of Dissonance drop rate set to 100%
Crystal Assassin Set will drop entirely
Mechanical Boss Treasure Bags:
Most of the hallowed ingots will drop (35 pieces)
Most souls will drop (40 for everyone)
Plantera Treasure Bag:
Thorn Hook drop rate set to 100%
Golem Treasure Bag:
Picksaw drop rate set to 100%
Most beetle shells will drop (23 pieces)
Duke Fishron's Treasure Bag:
Fishron Wings drop rate set to 100%
Empress of Light Treasure Bag:
Empress Wings drop rate set to 100%
Betsy's Treasure Bag:
Betsy's Wings drop rate set to 100%
Most Defender Medals will drop (49 pieces)

name: Fargo's Banner Boost
description:
Fargo's Banner Boost is a unique mod for tModLoader that adds RPG elements that strengthen you against enemies as you defeat them.

Main functions of the mod:
Upon reaching every 50th kill (by default), you gain damage reduction and increased damage against enemies.
At the maximum level of 20, you are completely immune to damage and always kill enemies in one hit.

name: Fargo's Fallen Stars
description:
Fargo's Fallen Stars is a mod for tModLoader that allows you to control how often fallen stars appear.

Main features of the mod:
