Automatic mining of blocks: When using a suitable tool and holding down a button (default - left mouse button), the mod will automatically mine all blocks around the selected block. This allows you to quickly mine resources and clear large areas of land.
Configurable block list: The mod allows you to configure the list of blocks that will be mined automatically. Users can add or remove blocks from the list to customize it to their needs.
Multiple Tool Support: The mod supports a variety of tools including picks, axes, and shovels. Users can choose the appropriate tool to mine each block.
Customizable Radius: Users can customize the mods radius to mine blocks in a wide or narrow radius around the selected block.
Various settings: The mod allows you to configure various parameters such as mining speed, delay between mining blocks and others.
Compatibility with other mods: Ore Excavator is compatible with most other Terraria mods and can be used simultaneously with them.
The Ore Excavator - The Successor to Vein Miner mod is a useful tool for mining resources in Terraria. It greatly speeds up the mining process and allows players to concentrate on other aspects of the game, such as building and combat.

name: Pylons Prevent Evils
description:
Pylons Prevent Evils (PPE) is a mod for tModLoader that adds a new mechanism to the game to protect villages from destructive events such as invasions or summoning bosses.

Features:

Addition of a new item called the "Pylon Key", which allows the player to activate pylon defenses in the village.
When protection is activated, all pylons in the village will be protected from enemies and troubles.
Village defense will also be automatically activated if the player starts a battle inside the village.
If the player has a Pylon Key, a marker will be displayed on the map indicating a protected village.
The mod also adds a new mechanic that allows the player to cancel the villages pylon defenses if they choose to do so.
Functions:

Addition of a new item “Pylon Key”, which activates the protection of pylons in the village.
Adding a new mechanic that allows the player to cancel the protection of pylons in the village.
Automatic activation of protection at the start of a battle inside a village.
Display a marker on the map indicating a protected village.
Ability to configure mod parameters through a configuration file.
Pylons Prevent Evils is a great mod for those who want to protect their villages from destructive events in the game. The mod adds a new item, mechanics and settings that will help players make the game more convenient and secure.

name: Smarter Cursor
description:
Smarter Cursor is a mod for tModLoader that improves the cursor and adds some additional features for the player's convenience.

Here are some of its features:

Improved cursor: The mod changes the appearance of the cursor and adds new animations to make it more vibrant and interesting.
Improved cursor movement: The mod allows you to move the cursor more accurately and quickly, making the game smoother.
Beautiful Effects: The mod adds new effects when you hover over various objects, which makes the game more visually appealing.
Various settings: The mod allows you to customize many aspects of the cursor, such as its color, transparency and shape.
Additional Features: The mod adds several additional features such as the ability to copy and paste text in the game, change the scale of the interface, and also adds new shortcuts to the minimap.
Compatibility with other mods: The mod is compatible with many other tModLoader mods, allowing players to use Smarter Cursor with other modifications and additions.
Overall, Smarter Cursor is a useful and convenient mod that improves the gameplay and makes the game more enjoyable for players.

name: Quality of Terraria
description:
Quality of Life (QoL) is a mod for the game Terraria that adds various functional and user-friendly interface elements that improve the player's quality of life.

Here is a list of some of these features:

Quickly Move Items - Allows you to quickly move items from your inventory to the ground or another container, such as a box or chest.
Fast recovery of health and mana - allows you to quickly use restorative items without opening your inventory.
Improved inventory - adds a new inventory interface with more convenient sorting and a quick search function.
Automatic Equipment - Allows you to automatically equip the best available weapons and armor.
Automatic use of accessories - allows you to automatically use accessories with positive effects, such as speeding up movement or increasing attack power.
Quick Block Destroy - Allows you to quickly destroy blocks, such as dirt or rock, with a single button press.
Automatic hacking - allows you to automatically hack chests and boxes without requiring additional tools.
Improved item collection mode - allows you to easily collect items located near the player.
Instant Boss Spawn - Allows you to quickly spawn bosses without having to search for the appropriate items.
Improved NPC search - allows you to quickly find the desired NPC using the search function.
These are just a few of the many features available in the Quality of Life mod for Terraria. They allow you to make the gaming process more convenient and efficient, saving the player’s time and effort.

name: Magic Storage
description:
Magic Storage is a mod for TModLoader in the Terraria game that adds automatic and organized access to items and inventory. This mod allows players to install vaults that automatically sort and store items in the game, making inventory management much easier.

List of storages added by the Magic Storage mod:

Storage Heart is the foundation for organizing storage. It is installed first and serves as the basis for the rest of the storage.
Storage Units are basic storage units that can store many items. They can be upgraded to have more capacity and various features such as quick access to items and automatic sorting.
The Crafting Interface is a repository that gives players access to materials and recipes for crafting items.
Crafting Storage is an advanced variant of the Crafting Interface that can also store and organize items needed for crafting.
Item Collector is a device that automatically collects items dropped from mobs and blocks. It can also be configured to collect certain items.
Item Router is a device that automatically redirects items from one storage to another depending on specified conditions. It can be used to automatically sort items in storage areas.
Remote Storage Access is a device that allows players to access their storage from anywhere in the world, just by having an active Storage Heart.
All of these storages can be configured to work with different items and materials, and can be easily rearranged and modified depending on the players needs. Magic Storage greatly simplifies gameplay by allowing players to focus on exploring and crafting rather than managing their inventory.

name: Recipe Browser
description:
Recipe Browser is a mod for the game Terraria that adds a convenient tool for searching and viewing recipes for items in the game.

Recipe search: The mod adds a search box where you can enter the name of an item or material and it will display all recipes that use that item or material.
Recipe information: You can get detailed information about each recipe, such as the crafting requirements, the materials needed to craft the item, and where you can find the materials.
Convenient inventory view: The mod also adds the ability to view your entire inventory without having to open it every time. You can select the item you want and see what recipes can be made from it.
Recipe history: The mod also keeps a history of all the recipes youve viewed, making it easy to come back to them later.
Filters: You can filter recipes by various categories such as items that can be crafted, items that can be used as materials, and so on.
Integration with other mods: The mod is compatible with most other mods, allowing you to see the recipes created by those mods.
Overall, Recipe Browser is a very useful mod for those who want to get the most out of Terraria. It simplifies the crafting process and allows you to quickly find information about items in the game.

name: Boss Checklist
description:
Boss Checklist is a mod for Terraria that adds an interface for tracking and managing bosses that are available in the game.

The main functions:

Shows a list of all bosses and events in the game, as well as information about them.
Allows you to track the progress and settings of each boss, including the number of wins, the last win, and the difficulty of the fight.
Contains many settings to customize the interface and boss settings.
Has integration with other mods like Calamity and Thorium.
Boss list:

Eye of Cthulhu
Eater of Worlds
Brain of Cthulhu
skeleton
Queen bee
Wall of flesh
The Twins
the destroyer
Skeletron prime
Plant
G
Duke fishron
Lunatic Cultist
Moon lord
Empress of Light
queen slime
Supreme Calamitas (for integration with Calamity Mod)
The Ragnarök (for integration with Thorium Mod)
In addition, the mod contains information about events such as Blood Moon, Eclipse, Pumpkin Moon and Frost Moon, and additional battles such as Duke Fishron (wing size) and Moon Lord (fair fight).

name: Calamity Overhaul
description:
Revitalize your Calamity Mod experience with Calamity Overhaul, a carefully crafted mod that optimizes every aspect of the Calamity universe. Immerse yourself in a world where hundreds of weapons have been reimagined, balancing has been improved, and game progression is enriched with innovative crafting systems.

Weapon Rework:

Hundreds of Calamity Mod weapons have been redesigned, offering players a more polished, practical and visually impressive arsenal.
Each weapon has undergone extensive tweaks to improve gameplay mechanics and overall performance.
The combat experience will be incredible with upgraded weapons that offer both form and function.
Balancing and Optimization:

Extensive numerical balancing ensures a smoother and more satisfying gaming experience.
Every aspect of Calamity Mod has been reviewed and fine-tuned for optimal balance.
Enjoy a more connected and immersive gaming experience with tweaks made to enemies, items, and progression.
Advanced Weapons:

Discover a variety of new weapons introduced to expand your arsenal and strategic options.
Experiment with unique weapon designs and playstyles to conquer the challenges of the Calamity universe.
Unleash devastating attacks with powerful new weapons designed to diversify your combat repertoire.
Crafting System Rework:

Embark on a journey of enriched game progression with an all-new crafting system.
Explore improved crafting recipes that offer more customization and player creativity.
Master the art of crafting to forge legendary weapons and equipment worthy of a true champion.
Constant Updates:

Stay tuned for future updates as the Calamity Overhaul mod continues to redefine the Calamity experience.
Get ready for fresh content and reimagined mechanics with every new update, providing endless excitement and challenge.
Join the community on Github to contribute to the development of the mod and follow its development first-hand.
Experience the Calamity universe like never before with the Calamity Overhaul mod. Redefine combat, crafting, and progression as you embark on an epic adventure full of new challenges and discoveries.

name: Exxo Avalon Origins
description:
Welcome to the world of Exxo Avalon: Origins! This modification introduces vanilla-centric content, expanding the game's capabilities while maintaining its atmosphere. This Pre-hardmode release features exciting adventures, including new structures, mechanics, and more.

Description: Immerse yourself in the exciting world of Exxo Avalon: Origins, where every step is imbued with a sense of adventure and mystery. Heres what you can expect in this Pre-hardmode release:

Features:

New structures: Explore numerous new structures, including the Ice Temple, Lava Temple, and Ominous Temple, which will add new layers to your adventure.
Worldly Evil: Meet the new world evil, infection, which will become an alternative to corruption and blood.
Stamina Mechanics: The new stamina mechanic gives you the ability to perform additional actions, such as teleporting and sprinting, without the need for accessories.
New prefixes and volumes: Enjoy new equipment prefixes and arcane tomes that provide unique stat bonuses.
Various add-ons: And that is not all! There are also various other improvements and additions that will enrich your time playing Terraria.

name: Split mod
description:
The Split mod brings fresh content to the world of Terraria, offering players over 700 new items including weapons, armor, accessories, monsters, bosses and more. With the goal of enriching the gaming experience, Split Mod aims to provide players with a cohesive and exciting addition to the main game without compromising its charm and atmosphere.

Over 700 New Items:
New unique weapons, armor sets, accessories and much more!
Over 40 New Monsters:
Each with unique animations and attacks, giving the game a new challenge.
7 New Bosses:
With unique artificial intelligence, providing exciting battles.
6 New City NPCs:
Each with its own interesting assortment of goods for sale and exchange.
Two New Structures:
The Abandoned Ship and the Underworld add new places to explore and adventure.
Russian Language Support:
Now the mod content is available in Russian, enriching the gaming experience for Russian-speaking players.
Compatible with Boss Checklist and Census Mod by Jopojelly:
Ease of use with popular mods, providing convenience and functionality.
Note: Split Mod is an immersive experience in a new game world, where every item, monster and boss is created with loving detail to bring you unique adventures in every corner of Terraria. Give in to the appeal of Split Mod and immerse yourself in an exciting split reality!

name: Elements Awoken
description:
Elements Awoken is a massive expansion to the world of Terraria, introducing thousands of new items, dozens of unique enemies, and exciting new boss battles. This mod was created to expand the gameplay, enriching it with new features and challenges. Dive into the world of the Elements and prepare for exhilarating adventures unlike anything you've ever seen in Terraria.

1000+ New Items:
Discover a huge arsenal of new items that expand your ability to create and survive.
50+ New Enemies:
Face new enemies, each providing unique challenges and rewards.
13 New Bosses:
Be tested by advanced creatures ready to test your combat skills in epic battles.
3 New Mini-Bosses:
Meet smaller, but no less dangerous creatures, ready to test your strength.
3 New City NPCs:
Chat with new characters in the city who provide unique services and items.
2 New Events:
Face new events filled with danger and rich rewards.
New Biome and Many Structures:
Explore a new biome and discover many fascinating structures deep within the world of Terraria.
Difficulty Mode Superior to Expert Mode:
Experience a new level of difficulty introduced into the game with a common sense system in mind.
Interactive Boss Checklist:
Interact with the boss checklist, which provides rewards for defeating powerful creatures.
Unique Mechanics:
Experience unique mechanics such as encounters, abilities, and an elevated atmosphere.
Note: The biome, abilities, and ambience of the elevation are 1.4 content and therefore not yet available in the game. Prepare for new adventures when these opportunities become available!

name: Rothur Mod
description:
Rothur Mod is a fun mod for tModLoader that adds new items, monsters, and more to the game.

200+ new items: The modification offers more than 200 new items that will diversify your gaming experience. From new weapons and armor to unique accessories and awesome items, there are plenty of opportunities to experiment and create a unique character.
15+ new enemies: The Rothur mod introduces new enemies that will challenge your fighting skills. New unique monsters with different attacks and abilities await you. Get ready for new battles and adventures!
3 mini-bosses: Exciting battles await you with three new mini-bosses. These powerful opponents present a serious challenge for you and your team. Defeat them to receive unique rewards and advance further in the game.
4 bosses: The Rothur Mod has four new bosses that provide the most challenging and epic battles. Use your skills and strategies to defeat them and get powerful items and rewards that will help you further in the game.
New class: Rothur Mod introduces a new character class that will allow you to use unique skills and abilities. Explore new possibilities and become a master of this class to conquer new challenges and enemies.
New biome: The modification also adds a new biome that offers a unique atmosphere and resources for you and your team. Explore it to discover new secrets and adventures.
Version 0.2.5 is now available! Upgrade and enjoy the new features and challenges that Rothur Mod offers!

name: Storm's Additions
description:
Storm's Additions Mod (formerly known as Storm Diver's Additions Mod) is a mod that adds a ton of new unique content to the game, totaling over 300 items. It expands on some of the vanilla game's item sets and includes many new unique sets spread throughout the game, as well as many individual items that are obtainable in their own unique way.

This mod includes:

Over 100 new unique weapons of all classes, including some minions and watchtowers
Over 40 new accessories, including new Expert Exclusive items and some changes to vanilla accessories
15 new armor sets with unique set bonuses, some of them use a separate hotkey, make sure it is assigned in control settings (default is V)
29 new enemies throughout the game, with banners and bestiary entries
3 new bosses: one at the end of the pre-difficulty period, one on Planteras level with a setting to fight him instead, and one secret after the Full Moon
New ammo, tools, potions, appearance items and pets
The cultist drops off his bag with some new items
New member of the Legion of Frost
Full Wikithis support
The mod also contains some small quality of life features:

New recipes and loot for some impossible-to-craft vanilla items, including the Rod of Mayhem, Snow and Gladiator Armor, the Cham Fisherman, and even the Slime Staff
Special super mannequin with multiple options
Most NPCs now sell their dropped weapons
A special mini-boss after the Full Moon that drops Moon Fragments and Luminite
Item that can remove shields from pilasters
Generates additional chests from granite, marble and mushrooms in the corresponding biomes

name: Conquest
description:
The “Conquest” mod for tModLoader offers more than 150 items, 1 city NPC, 3 bosses, 8 enemies, 1 set of armor, 2 dungeons, a permanent potion system, a new type of accessory - artifacts, a world map for selecting dungeons and fighting bosses, as well as talent tree.

More than 150 items: The Conquest mod adds over 150 new items, including weapons, armor, accessories and other useful items for your character.
1 city NPC: In the Conquest mod, 1 new city NPC appears, which offers unique services and items to the player.
3 bosses: You will be able to fight with 3 new bosses, each of which has its own unique attacks and abilities.
8 enemies: The Conquest mod adds 8 new enemies that will present new challenges and battles for you.
1 set of armor: You will have access to 1 new set of armor, which has unique properties and protection.
2 dungeons: The Conquest mod offers 2 new dungeons to explore and find valuable resources and loot.
Permanent potion system: The Conquest mod features a permanent potion system that allows you to use different potions with effects without having to have them in your inventory after use.
New special type of accessories, artifacts: The Conquest mod introduces a new type of accessory called artifacts. You can only have one artifact that changes the gameplay or provides unique effects to the player.
World map: The "Conquest" mod includes a world map that allows you to select dungeons and fight mod bosses, and also offers unique loot in the form of "Artifacts".
Talent tree: The Conquest mod introduces a talent tree, accessible through the Mirror of the Eight Trigrams item. This is a new way to develop your character, allowing you to choose skills that improve your abilities.

name: Homeward Journey
description:
Homeward Journey is an expansion for the original Terraria game that offers convenient features and new content. The mod currently includes 693 items and 89 NPCs, including 12 bosses. In Master mode there are two bosses with unique artificial intelligence. Homeward Journey also offers expanded content beyond Plantera and Moon Lord, adding new areas to explore and new bosses to fight.

The update includes several new features and improvements for the Homeward Journey mod:

Adding artificial intelligence in Master mode for Gemini and Mother Brain. You can now customize the Gemini AI in the mods configuration.
Adding flamethrowers that will allow you to use fire attacks in battles.
Coal Wall now has unique drops, including trophies, pets, weapons and other items.
The Priestesss Wand will now drop useless items less frequently.
Added Nightblade-themed weapons for three other classes.
Chests in the Abyss now require a key to open.
The mod has been optimized, which will allow you to play more smoothly and without delays.
Some bug fixes have been made to improve overall stability and performance.
The mod also has an expansion for all classes, offering new accessories and weapons to create a fresh and varied gaming experience. You can also build special structures to get special effects - ask the Goblin Repairer about this when you find something strange.

name: Starlight River
description:
Starlight River is a mod for tModLoader that adds new content to the Terraria game, creating a great fantasy atmosphere. In this mod you will find new biomes, mobs, items and much more.

New biomes:
Star Lake: This is a beautiful biome filled with shining stars and a magical atmosphere. Here you will find new plants, mobs and ores.
Magical Forest: This biome is located in the upper levels of the world and is filled with magical trees and plants. You can meet new enemies and explore unique places in this biome.
New mobs:
Star Marsupial: A peaceful creature that lives in Star Lake. You can catch him and use him as a pet.
Shining Elf: A hostile mob that appears in the Magic Forest. It attacks the player with magical attacks and can drop valuable items.
New items:
Star Bow: A powerful weapon that shoots arrows covered in glittering stars. This is an excellent weapon for fighting enemies in dark caves.
Magic Amulet: An amulet that enhances your magical abilities and enhances your magical attack.
Wizards Candle: An item that creates magical illumination around you, helping you see in the dark.
New events:
Rising Stars: This event takes place in Star Lake and offers unique challenges and rewards. You will fight powerful bosses and search for hidden treasures.
New buildings:
Star Tower: Rising above the Star Lake, this tower contains valuable items and dangers. You must overcome its challenges to reach the top.

name: Decadent Skills
description:
Decadent Skills is a mod for tModLoader that adds new skills and abilities for the character in the game Terraria. These skills provide players with new ways to combat enemies and additional ways to explore the world.

New Classes: The mod adds new classes such as the Mage Knight and Shadow Monk, which provide unique combat abilities and abilities.
New Abilities: The mod adds new abilities such as Blood Rush, Whirlwind Attack, and Phantom Step, which allow players to control the battle in a more efficient and exciting style.
Improved Weapons: The mod adds new weapons and tools such as the Priests Blade, Poison Spikes and Electric Dagger, which have unique properties and abilities.
New Bosses: The mod adds new bosses such as the "snake king" and "black widow", which present new challenges for players and additional rewards for defeating them.
New Items: The mod adds new items such as the Mages Hat and Soul Orb, which provide players with additional abilities and upgrades for their characters.
New effects: The mod adds new effects such as “time slowing” and “petrification”, which can be used both in battle and as additional abilities for the character.
New Gear: The mod adds new armor sets and accessories, such as the Demon Seal and Heavens Crest, which give players new abilities and upgrades for their characters.
Overall, Decadent Skills is a mod that adds a large number of new features and functionality to the Terraria game, allowing players to create unique and powerful characters and take on new adventures.

name: Overlord Vanities
description:
Overlord Vanities is a modification for the game Terraria developed for TModLoader, which adds new cosmetic items to the game for characters and creates new appearances for them.

Overlords Crown - A character crown crafted from iron, gold and gems.
Overlords Mantle - A cloak crafted from dragon skin and other materials.
Overlords Boots - Boots crafted from dragon leather and other materials.
Overlords Sword - A sword crafted from gold and other materials with the ability to emit lasers.
Overlords Shield - A shield crafted from gold and other materials that can block blows and emit energy.
Overlords Wings - Wings created from dragon feathers that allow the character to fly.
Overlords Cloak - A cloak crafted from the fabric of darkness that can protect the character and increase their speed.
These items not only make the character more beautiful, but also add new options for combat and movement to the game.

name: Yggdrasil
description:
Yggdrasil is a modification for the game Terraria, designed to be used with TModLoader, a tool that allows you to add modifications to the game. The Yggdrasil mod adds many new items, blocks, enemies, bosses and many other elements to enrich the gameplay of the game.

New biomes:
A biome of stone ruins full of dangers and treasures.
A forest of shimmering trees that offers new species of trees and plants.
A mystical forest where players can find new resources and animals.
A swampy forest where unique items and monsters can be found.
New items:
Lots of new weapons, armor and accessories that add new combat options.
New tools and resources that enhance the gameplay experience and give players more creative options.
Various items to improve your home or world, including new blocks, furniture and decor.
New bosses:
The King of Stone Ruins is a boss who protects his ancient treasures.
The King of the Shimmering Trees is a boss who guards the forest of shimmering trees.
Magic Forest Spirit is a boss that appears in the mystical forest.
The Mistress of the Swamp is a boss who lives in the swampy forest.
New game mechanics:
The ability to create spiritual weapons and armor that give players new abilities.
New search and stealth systems for more interesting interaction with the environment.
Various improvements to the game interface, such as automatic inventory sorting and more convenient item management.

name: Tremor Remastered
description:
Tremor Remastered is a modification for the game Terraria that adds many new gameplay elements, items, biomes and other features.

New Biomes: The mod adds several new biomes, including the Frozen Wasteland, the Deep Ocean, and the Underground Jungle. Each biome has its own unique obstacles, monsters and items.
New Items: Tremor Remastered adds over 300 new items, including weapons, armor, accessories and resources. Some of them have unique abilities that will help you in battle or during exploration.
New Enemies: The mod adds over 70 new enemies that can be found in different biomes. Each enemy has its own unique abilities and characteristics.
New Bosses: Tremor Remastered adds over 20 new bosses that can be summoned under different conditions. Each boss has its own unique abilities and can be very difficult to defeat.
New NPCs: The mod adds several new NPCs that can be found in different biomes. Some of them may sell unique items or have tasks for the player.
New Features: Tremor Remastered also adds new features such as new crafting mechanics, a revamped battle system, and new character abilities.
Some of the most popular features of the Tremor Remastered mod include:

Biomes: Frozen Wasteland, Deep Ocean, Underground Jungle, Abyss, Garden of Eden, Hell World.
Weapons: katanas, archer kits, magic shields, air guns, bomb thrower, flying red pandas.
Armor: Magma armor, Soul armor, Air armor, Ice armor, Night armor.
Bosses: Black Knight, Fire Dragon, Arctic Bear, Crystal Scorpion, Demonic Worm, Lord of the Mists and many others.
Here are some more features of the Tremor Remastered mod:

Chests: The mod adds several new chests that contain unique items and resources. For example, a Magma Chest can contain magma crystals, and a Soul Chest can contain soul crystals.
Classes: The mod adds new character classes that can be selected at the beginning of the game. Each class has its own unique abilities and characteristics.
Events: Tremor Remastered adds several new events that can happen during the game. For example, the Day of the Reptiles event can occur after you defeat certain bosses and will contain unique enemies and items.
Music: The mod adds new music tracks that can be heard in different biomes and environments.
Expert Mode: Tremor Remastered also supports Expert Mode, which increases the games difficulty and adds new features.

name: Atherius
description:
Atherius Mod is a mod for the game Terraria that adds new items, blocks, bosses and much more to the game.

New bosses: Several new bosses have been added to the mod, each with their own unique mechanics and drops.
New Items: The mod contains many new items including weapons, armor, accessories and more.
New Blocks: The mod also adds many new blocks that can be used to create decorations and structures.
New NPCs: There are several new NPCs in the mod that provide players with new tasks and items.
Various Changes: The mod also makes various changes to the gameplay, including balance changes, graphics improvements, and more.
Some specific features of Atherius Mod include:

Ladys Dagger: A weapon that deals damage and slows enemies.

Carpet Grass: A block that can be used to create carpets and decorative items.

name: Dragon Ball
description:
Dragon Ball Terraria 1.0.9.9 Ported is a mod for the game Terraria that adds elements and characters from the anime series "Dragon Ball".

New Characters: The mod adds many new characters from the Dragon Ball universe to the game, including the main characters and villains of the series.
New Items: The mod introduces many new items such as costumes, weapons, potions and other items that can be found in the world of Terraria.
New bosses: New bosses appear in the game, guarding new places and dropping valuable items. Among them are familiar characters from Dragon Ball.
New locations: the mod adds new locations to the game that correspond to the locations from Dragon Ball. You will now be able to visit Planet Neimek or the Capsule Corporation.
New Combat Mechanics: The mod introduces new combat mechanics that allow players to use super abilities from Dragon Ball. You can now use Kamehameha or Doju in the game.
New quests: the mod adds new quests to the game, which offer players to complete various tasks and receive valuable rewards for this.
New NPCs: New NPCs appear in the game and provide various services to players, such as selling items or providing information about the world.

name: Victima Mod Rebirth
description:
Victima Mod Rebirth is a modification for the game Terraria that adds new enemies, items, bosses and much more.

New Enemies – The mod adds a variety of new enemies, each with their own unique attacks and abilities. Some of them can even chase the player for long distances, so be careful!
New Items – The mod adds many new items that you can use to improve your character. They can provide additional damage, speed, protection and much more.
New Bosses - The mod adds several new bosses, each with their own unique battle mechanics. They can be very difficult, so be prepared for a difficult battle.
New Worlds - The mod adds new worlds in which to explore and fight new enemies and bosses. Each world has its own unique characteristics, so you may need to use different strategies to win.
New mechanics - the mod adds many new mechanics that can be used to create various devices and mechanisms. Some of them can be very useful, especially when fighting bosses.
New Quests - The mod adds many new quests that can be completed to receive various rewards. They can be related to exploring the world, fighting enemies, or creating certain items.
New NPCs - the mod adds new NPCs that can offer the player new tasks, items and much more. They can also help the player in battle if they ask for it.
Some of the new items that the Victima Mod Rebirth adds:

The Demon Sword is a powerful sword that deals massive damage and has high speed.
The Blade of the Empire is a sword that deals a lot of damage and has the ability to reflect some attacks from enemies.
Armor of the Supreme Mage is armor that increases the characters magical damage and defense.
Storm Staff is a magical staff that damages all enemies in the area and causes lightning.
The Heavens Crystal is an item that can be used to summon the new boss, the Archangel.
The Void Rod is a magical item that can create black holes that absorb enemies and cause damage to them.
Some of the new worlds that the Victima Mod Rebirth adds:

The World of Darkness is a world completely immersed in darkness, home to new enemies and bosses.
The World of Heaven is a world inhabited by angels and powerful bosses. You can also find new items and weapons.
The Kingdom World is a world where kings and their subjects live. Here you can find new items and bosses.
This is just a small list of the many new features that the Victima Mod Rebirth adds to Terraria. This mod is a great choice for those who want to expand their gaming experience and add more options for exploration and combat.

name: Verdant
description:
Verdant is a mod for TModLoader that adds many new items, enemies, biomes and features to the Terraria game.

New biomes:

Bamboo Forest: A biome consisting of tall bamboo stalks, similar to bamboo groves. This biome is home to new enemies and plants.
Blooming Forest: a biome with many flowers and new mobs. You can find new resources and loot in it.
Rotten Lands: A biome consisting of rotten land where new resources and enemies can be found.
New items:

Magic Wands: A new type of weapon that allows the player to cast various magic spells.
New Armor Sets: Armor sets that provide unique bonuses and abilities.
New Weapons and Tools: New weapons and tools that allow the player to gather resources and fight enemies more efficiently.
New Enemies:

Bamboo Dragon: A new type of enemy that lives in bamboo forests and can attack the player with fire breath.
Flower Golem: A new type of enemy that appears in flowering forests and can attack the player with its flower petals.
Rotstorm: A new type of enemy that appears in the rotting lands and can attack the player with electrical discharges.
Overall, the Verdant mod adds a lot of new features to the Terraria game and allows players to have a new gaming experience.

name: Archery Overhaul
description:
Archery Overhaul is a mod for Terraria that changes and improves archery mechanics. It is available for download and installation using the mod manager Tmodloader.

List of changes and improvements made by this mod:

New types of arrows and combat ammunition:
Arrows with various effects such as poison, fire and ice.
Arrows with enhanced piercing ability that can pierce multiple enemies.
Arrows that break into many small projectiles during flight.
Combat ammunition that can be used as traps or for protection.
Improved accuracy and range:
Bows become more accurate and have a longer firing range.
New types of sights, such as zoom sights and laser sights, improve shooting accuracy.
Management and crafting:
New bow control interface that allows you to quickly switch between different types of arrows and sights.
Adding new materials for creating bows, arrows and other combat ammunition.
List of features of the Archery Overhaul mod:

Includes new types of arrows and combat ammunition.
Improves archery accuracy and range.
Provides new types of sights and bow control interface.
Adds new materials for creating bows, arrows and other combat ammunition.
This mod is perfect for archery fans and for those who want to diversify the gameplay in Terraria.

name: Spinal Universe
description:
Spinal Universe is a modification for the game Terraria that adds new worlds, bosses, items and other game elements to the game. The mod is designed to be used with tModLoader, a tool that makes it easy to install and manage mods in Terraria.

The list of main features of the Spinal Universe mod includes:

New worlds:
Spinal Planet: A new world with new biomes, bosses and items available.
Necro Planet: a world filled with undead and dark forces.
Inferno Planet: a world full of lava and fire.
New bosses:
Spinal Devourer: A boss similar to Eater of Worlds, but with new battle mechanics.
Necro Lord: A powerful undead mage capable of summoning an army of zombies.
Inferno Lord: The demonic ruler of the lava caves, who can create fire elements.
New items:
Spinal Armor: Armor that increases melee damage.
Necro Staff: A staff that summons zombies and skeletons to fight at your side.
Inferno Blade: A sword that deals additional fire damage.
New game mechanics:
The ability to interact with items in the inventory without opening it.
Ability to change the color of armor and accessories.

name: The Story of Red Cloud Revamped
description:
The Story of Red Cloud Revamped is a mod for the game Terraria that can be installed using the tModLoader program. The mod adds a new storyline to the game, including new bosses, enemies, items and mechanics.

The mod has several different sections, each of which makes its own changes to the game:

Storyline: Includes a new storyline with new NPCs, bosses and locations. The plot of the mod is revealed as the game progresses, and it can be complex and demanding of the players skills.
Items: Adds new items that can be used in the game. This includes weapons, armor, accessories and other items that can help you progress through the game.
Enemies: Includes new enemies that appear at different stages of the game. These can be various monsters, as well as bosses that must be defeated.
NPCs (NPCs): Adds new NPCs that provide the player with additional services and help in progressing through the game.
Some of the main elements that The Story of Red Cloud Revamped mod for TModLoader includes:

New NPCs: Hunter, Free Artist, Comrade Eli and others.
New bosses: Barbarian Rogue, Mad Professor and others.
New locations: House of the Free Artist, New Castle and others.
New items: Artists Brush, Sword of Creation and others.
These changes allow players to enjoy a new experience in Terraria and offer new challenges for more advanced players.

name: Secrets Of The Shadows
description:
Secrets of the Shadows is a Tmodloader mod for Terraria that adds new items, blocks, creatures, and other changes to the game to create a darker, more atmospheric environment.

New Items: The mod adds many new items to the game, including new weapons, armor, accessories and others.
New Blocks: The mod also adds new blocks to the game including Gloomy Bricks, Crystals and more.
New Creatures: The mod adds new creatures to the game, including new bosses, minions and mobs.
New Mechanics: The mod also adds new mechanics to the game, such as new abilities and skills for the player.
New Sound Effects: The mod adds new sound effects to the game to create a darker and more atmospheric environment.
New Textures: The mod also changes the appearance of many items, blocks and creatures in the game to create a darker environment.
Improved Compatibility: The mod is compatible with many other Tmodloader mods, making it more versatile.

name: REMNANTS
description:
REMNANTS is a mod for Terraria that adds new items, blocks, enemies, and more to the game. It also includes new game mechanics that enhance the gameplay and provide new options for players

New items:

Soul Cathars are melee weapons that deal high damage and can be used to craft other items

New Enemies:

New Features for Creating Unique Worlds - Players can use new items and blocks to create unique worlds.
REMNANTS is an interesting and varied mod for the game Terraria that adds many new elements and mechanics to the game. If you want to expand your gaming experience and get new features, then this mod is definitely for you!

name: Catalyst Mod
description:
Catalyst Mod is one of many mods that can be installed in TModLoader. It adds new gear, bosses, and other gameplay elements to the game.

List of functions and features of Catalyst Mod:

New weapons and armor. Catalyst Mod adds a large number of new types of weapons and armor to the game that will help the player complete the game more efficiently.
New bosses. The mod adds several new bosses that can be summoned and defeated by the player. Each boss has its own unique characteristics and abilities.
New NPCs. Catalyst Mod adds new NPCs that can help the player in the game. They provide new tasks and can sell useful items to the player.
New items. The mod adds many new items that can be used to create new items or improve existing ones.
New biomes. Catalyst Mod adds several new biomes that have their own unique resources and monsters.
New events. The mod adds new events that occur during the game and give the player the opportunity to gain new items and experience.
Various fixes and improvements. Catalyst Mod includes many fixes and improvements that make the game more stable and easier to use.

name: Consolaria
description:
Consolaria is a modification for the game Terraria that adds many new items, mobs, bosses and other gameplay elements to the game. This mod is available for download on TModLoader, a Terraria modding toolkit.

List of main features and elements added by the Consolaria mod:

New biomes and locations:
Crystal Wasteland: A new biome containing many crystals and gems.

Calcifers Arena: A new arena where players can fight a giant boss.
New mobs and bosses:
Boss Moon Cat: A new boss that can be summoned on the Moon and drops a lot of valuable items.
Archer: a new mob that can drop in the Crystal Wasteland and attack the player from afar.
T-Rex: a new mob that can drop out in the Terra Labyrinth and attack the player in melee.
New items and recipes:
Crystal Blocks: New blocks that can be used for construction.
Crystal Mine: New ore that can be used to create new items and weapons.
Calcifers Orb: A new item that can be used to summon the boss in Calcifers Arena.
Improvements and balancing:
New upgrades for many items and weapons to make them more effective in combat.
Balancing many existing items and mobs to improve their gameplay.
Consolaria is a great mod that adds a lot of new elements to Terraria. It may be of interest to both beginners and experienced players who are looking for new challenges and opportunities in the game.

name: Fargo's Mutant Mod
description:
Fargo's Mutant mod for tModLoader adds many new items, NPCs and other features to the game. Below is a description of the main features of the mod, including content lists.

Includes new NPCs with unique features and quests

This is just a small overview of what can be found in the Fargos Mutant mod for tModLoader. It provides players with many new features and functions that make the game even more exciting and varied.

name: Orchid Mod
description:
Orchid Mod is a modification for the game Terraria that adds many new items, monsters and bosses, and also changes the gameplay, making it more varied and interesting.

New bosses:

name: Terraria Overhaul
description:
Terraria Overhaul is a mod for the game Terraria that brings many changes to the gameplay and gameplay. It overhauls most aspects of the game, including combat, progression, world generation, economics, and more.

Combat and the damage system have been redesigned, resulting in a more realistic and strategic combat system.
The resource system has been improved, new items and crafting recipes have been added.
Weather changes, new effects added such as snow and rain.
Improved physics and gravity, which allows characters to move more realistically and allows you to use new strategies in battles.
New game mechanics such as thermal mode and seasonality.
Inventory and user interface changes.
A large number of new enemies and bosses, as well as changes to existing ones.
Improved research system and character development process.
Added new music tracks and sound effects.

name: Dungeons And Dragons
description:
Dungeons and Dragons Terraria is a modification that is a faithful recreation of the game Dungeons and Dragons in the world of Terraria. While this mod may not be the most powerful or in-depth mod out there, it does add a sense of familiarity to an all-time favorite game.

To start playing with this mod, you need level 1 and a mana crystal. It adds many new spells to the game, a leveling system, a Spellslot system, a class system, and a damage system that exactly matches DnD rolled dice. To balance the game, spells are multiplied by a mastery bonus that increases as you level up, allowing spells to be upgraded as the game progresses.

Due to their unique nature and ability to deal low damage, all weapons are able to ignore defenses. Updates are planned to include bosses and monsters from DnD, more spells, more weapons using the DnD damage system, and familiar game elements.

name: Terrarchitect
description:
Terrarchitect is a mod for the game Terraria that allows players to quickly and easily build various structures and designs in the game.

Building tools and blocks: Terrarchitect adds a large selection of tools and blocks that can be used to create a variety of structures. Some of these tools include tools for building walls, tiles, furniture, decorative items, and more.
Scalable Blocks: Instead of building each block separately, Terrarchitect allows players to scale the blocks and create them in any size and shape, which speeds up the building process and gives more design freedom.
Artistic elements: Terrarchitect also adds a lot of artistic elements that can be used to create decorative items. These elements include drawings, murals, tattoos and more.
Structure kits: The mod also contains sets of structures that can be quickly deployed in the game. These kits include houses, castles, towers and more.
Automatic tools: Terrarchitect includes automatic tools to help speed up the building process. For example, tools automatically align walls and tiles and can create repeating elements throughout a structure.
Multiplayer support: Terrarchitect is fully compatible with multiplayer mode, allowing players to build with their friends and speed up the building process.
Terrarchitect is a useful mod for Terraria that makes the building process easier and faster and gives more freedom in design.

name: Assorted Crazy Things
description:
Assorted Crazy Things is a mod for the game Terraria that adds many new items, mobs and other elements to the game.

New Mobs: Assorted Crazy Things adds many new mobs including bosses, zombies, dragons and more. Each mob has its own unique abilities and characteristics, which makes the game more diverse and interesting.
New Weapons and Tools: The mod also adds many new weapons and tools that can be used to fight new mobs and craft new items. Some of these items include magic wands, flamethrowers, lasers, and more.
New Blocks and Decorative Items: Assorted Crazy Things adds many new blocks and decorative items that you can use to build new structures and decorate your bases. Some of these items include new walls, furniture, carpets, and more.
New Biomes: The mod also adds several new biomes that can be explored and unlocked in the game. Some of these biomes include fire caves, ice caves, and jungles.
New Events: Assorted Crazy Things adds several new events to the game that happen randomly and add even more variety to the game. Some of these events include lunar eclipses, meteor showers, and alien invasions.
Crafting and Recipes: The mod also adds new crafting recipes and items that you can use to create new things and improve your equipment.
Assorted Crazy Things is a mod for Terraria that adds many new items, mobs and other elements to the game, making it more varied and interesting for players.

name: Calamity's Vanities
description:
Calamity's Vanities is a modification for the game Terraria that adds a large number of new items, bosses and mechanics to the game. Some of these items are just for decoration and have no in-game value, but many of them provide unique abilities and bonuses to the player.

Colorful Fireworks - Various colored fireworks that can be used for decoration or to create beautiful effects while playing.
Paper lanterns are decorations that can be hung on walls and used as lighting at night.
Boss Masks are decorative masks that can be obtained after defeating bosses in the game. Additionally, masks can be used to create special items such as boss pets.
Auro Blessings are effects that can be equipped on a character to improve their abilities and defense.
Cosmetic accessories are items that change a characters appearance, such as wings, bracelets, hats, and more.
Musical instruments are items that can be used to create music in the game.
New mounts are new types of transport that can be used to move around the world of Terraria.
Cosmetic weapons are weapons that do not have high game value, but can be used to create effects and visual effects.
Gifts are items that can be found during the game and can contain valuable items or simply be decorative.
This is just a small list of items available in Calamitys Vanities. The modification adds many more new elements to the game that can change the gameplay and make the game even more interesting and varied.

name: Fargo's Souls Mod
description:
Fargo's Souls Mod for Terraria is a modification of the game that adds many new items, bosses and mechanics to the game.

New items:

Over 500 new items including new weapons, armor, accessories, needs, tools, decorative items and more.
Each item has its own unique properties and abilities, allowing players to create different combinations of items and use them in combat.
New enemies and bosses:

Over 100 new enemies and bosses, each with unique attacks, abilities and stats.
Some of the bosses are multi-story and have multiple battle phases, making them more difficult to defeat.
New game mechanics:

An improved class system that allows players to choose their class and receive unique bonuses and abilities according to the chosen class.
A new quest system that offers players the opportunity to complete various tasks in order to obtain new items and rewards.
A new shop and trade system that allows players to sell and buy items from merchants in the game.
New Challenges and Achievements:

Over 40 new challenges and achievements that players can complete to earn special rewards and unlock new features in the game.

name: Thorium Mod
description:
Thorium Mod is one of the most popular third-party mods for the game Terraria, which adds a large amount of new content, including new items, bosses, NPCs and other features.

Among the main features of Thorium Mod are the following:

New Biomes - The mod adds several new biomes such as swamps and desert, each containing unique items and creatures.
New Items – The mod adds over 2 new items, including new weapons, armor, tools, accessories, crafting items and more.
New NPCs - the mod adds more than 20 new NPCs, each of which can offer the player unique services and items.
New Bosses - The mod adds over 10 new bosses, each of which has unique abilities and items that can be obtained by defeating them.
New Mechanics – The mod adds many new mechanics, such as the ability to craft and apply “effects” to items, new ways to move around the map, and much more.
Thorium Mod includes the following:

2600 new products!
60 new armor sets!
180 new enemies and banners!
600 new tiles, blocks and furniture!
10 new city NPCs!
11 new bosses and 3 mini-boss encounters!
2 new biomes: water depths и natural cemetery !
3 new class, Thrower , Bard and Healer!
Fully balanced content!

name: Jojos Caesar Sound
description:
JojosCaesarSound
This mod, named JojosCaesarSound, enhances the gaming experience in Terraria by adding a new sound effect. When a player is hit by a Boulder, the SHIZAAAAAAAAAAAA meme will start playing.

Compatibility
This mod is compatible with tModLoader v2024.1.3.0 and Terraria v1.4.4.9

name: Calamity Mod
description:
Calamity Mod is a modification for the computer game Terraria, which adds new elements, mechanics and bosses to the game, increasing the complexity and duration of the gameplay.

With this mod you will get many new bosses, unique and challenging difficulty modes, over a thousand new items, new NPCs and whole new biomes for research! Calamity also greatly expands the endgame of Terraria, creating a completely original and intense experience for players.

The mod further tweaks many Vanilla features and greatly expands the base game, including but not limited to:

Reworked the reforging of the goblin mechanic.
Reworked game progress in early hardmode.
Dozens of additional crafting recipes for existing vanilla items.
Dozens more quality of life and balance changes!
Among the main features of Calamity Mod are:

New bosses and monsters: The mod adds over 35 new bosses and monsters, each with their own unique abilities and attacks. Bosses become available as you progress through the game, and defeating them requires good strategy and a willingness to fight.
New items and weapons: The Calamity Mod adds over 1000 new items and over 100 new weapons to the game that allow players to deal with new bosses and monsters more effectively.
New locations and biomes: mod adds new locations to the game that you can explore and extract resources. The new biomes are represented by various zones such as the destruction zone, the battle zone, the wandering spirit zone and many others.
Expert mode: The Calamity Mod adds an expert mode to the game that increases the difficulty of the gameplay by increasing the damage and health of bosses, monsters, and the player.
Class rework: The modification reworks the character classes, providing more options for customizing the character for a specific play style.
New game mechanics: The Calamity Mod adds many new mechanics to the game, such as new abilities and effects, dynamic events, improved mechanics for interacting with objects, and much more.

All in all, the Calamity Mod is a great addition to the Terraria game, providing players with new challenges and opportunities to progress through the game. However, it should be noted that the mod greatly increases the complexity of the gameplay, so it is recommended that newcomers to the game first learn the basics of the game before diving into the world of Calamity Mod.

name: Overhaul v5.0
description:
This is only a beta version of the Overhaul mod for Terraria 1.4 so far, so there are bugs and imperfections. But now you can download the mod and test it. According to the authors of the mod, this version is about 60%+ ready.

What is the Terraria Overhaul mod
This is a huge mod that, instead of adding new content to the game, focuses on adding new game mechanics and completely overhauling existing ones.

name: Calamity v1.5
description:
An update to one of the biggest mods for Terraria. In this version, the developers have added a new difficulty mode - Anger Mode and new mechanics. name: Night's Conversion
description:
What is Night's Conversion?
Night's Conversion allows you to use the properties of every sword that went into the Night's Edge. When using Night's Conversion, you can craft 3 new swords, each of which have some relation to one of the swords that went into the Night's Edge. The regular Night's Edge is assumed to be the Light's Bane version for this mod.

What does Night's Conversion add?
The first sword added is the Night's Katana. The Night's Katana has the added ability of autoswing, inherited from the Muramasa. While swinging the sword, monster spawns are also increased, due to the fact that you receive the Water Candle debuff.
The second sword added is the Night's Jungle. The Night's Jungle has the ability to poison enemies on contact, inherited from the Blade of Grass. Unlike the Blade of Grass, the Poisoned debuff is applied 100% of the time and lasts for 3 seconds.
The third sword added is the Night's Flame. The Night's Flame has the ability to burn enemies on contact, inherited from the Fiery Greatsword. The On Fire! debuff is always applied for 3 seconds.

name: The Polarities v0.8.1.4
description:
The authors of The Polarities mod focused on adding new bosses to Terraria. At the same time, they emphasize the quality and compliance of the bosses with the vanilla style of play. Now in this mod there are 8 new bosses, new weapons, armor and other items.

Details about bosses

The polarities
A couple of bosses that always remain on opposite sides of the player. They drop several powerful weapons and materials to create a unique set of armor, as well as a useful exclusive accessory for experts. Designed to fight after the golem.
Sun pixie
A giant pixie that bombards the player with lasers and deadly beams. Drops several solar-themed weapons useful for mechanical bosses. Designed to fight up to furs.

Storm Cloudfish
An early rain boss that drops several useful early game accessories and a rain switch. Designed to fight up to EoC.

Eclipxie
A much more difficult version of the Sun Pixie that fought during a solar eclipse. Some of his drops are enhancements to the Sun Pixie drops, while others are more unique. Designed to fight after the golem.

Gigabat
A massive cavern-fighting bat that summons a swarm of minions to defend itself and attack the player. Uniquely, it is triggered by the release of gems (crafted from gems and fireflies) in the cave layer. The more gems are released and the higher the level of the stone from which they are made, the faster the bat will arrive. Designed to fight shortly before the queen bee.

Star construct
The boss is best described as an unholy, screaming mix of Golem, Planter, and a player who has just discovered grappling hooks, designed to fight around the same time as the world evil bosses (World Eater / Brain of Cthulhu). He sometimes falls from the sky while sleeping and can be awakened by hitting him multiple times, although the player can also summon him manually.

Esophage
A boss dedicated to both world disasters unlocks access to an alternate world evil after being defeated, designed to fight around the same time as Plantera. Surprisingly resembles a jumping spider.

Hemorrhage
A much more powerful version of Esophagus that fought during the Blood Moon. Since the original wasn't creepy enough, it has longer and thinner legs. Designed to fight after the golem.
